"i'm 23 (m) don't have any friend, single, unemployed, undergrad and have no talent (or maybe never has a chance to figure out untill now)i suppozed to graduate this december if i didn't f it up, since <e1>there's something happened last year that really makes me depressed back in august and was planning to end my life in january</e1>, so <e2>i left anything important and try to enjoy days passing by waiting for that moment.........</e2>but things got better now, and that problem seems to slowly disappear.currently i got threatened by college that <e3>i might be expelled</e3> for<e4> not participating for nearly a year</e4>, my parents didn't know about this and i wish i can fix that so i can have a chance to enjoy life. i can't imagine my parent reaction when they know and it makes me contemplating on actually rescheduling it on july.i know this is my fault, everytime i get depressed i pick dumb decision that will f my life... but this one really will destroy it, i have no hope (maybe a little).i'm looking for advice if it won't bother youthankyou"

"i keep playing this imaginary scenario in my head. i'm at work tending to a cheerful customer, and it goes like:customer: how are you today?  :)me: heh...want the truth, or the socially acceptable answer?customer: ...the truth. :\me: ...are you sure? okay, i'm nearing the end of my rope, and <e1>my hands are burning</e1> with <e2>the desire to let go</e2>. i just want to make my anxiety and depression go away, but they won't. haha, i can't even afford to seek help. of course, <e3>you don't really want to know these things</e3>, so <e4>here's the socially acceptable answer anyway</e4>: i'm doing great :d and yourself?customer: wow...uhh...it gets better?  :|me: don't worry about it. your total is 10.75.i don't know...i'm getting tired to faking my answers to these stupid courtesy questions. no one cares how i'm doing. <e5>the small talk isn't good for anyone</e5>, and <e6>i didn't include it in my social script</e6>. <e7>most of the time it catches me off guard</e7>. <e8>i just want them to stuff their faces and get on with their own miserable existences<e8>."

"i text, they don't reply. i walk in the street, they don't acknowledge me. i cry for help in a moment of sheer pain, everyone i reach out to just cringes and wishes that moment to just pass. i post on social media, nobody reacts. i talk to therapists, none of what they say touches me.this is really hard to deal with when you are getting close to a suicidal state of mind. when <e1>you live like this and see that nobody really values you except for family that you can't spend more than 30 minutes with</e1>, <e2>you start to logically consider suicide</e2>. suicide attempts are sometimes regarded as cries for attention and help, and they are carried out to express pain- whereas succesful suicides are just an action to end pain. don't worry, i am not suicidal at the moment- but what if i experience this rock bottom once again and decide i don't want to endure it anymore? hell, what is the point enduring it now if i will come back here again?"

"<e1>i am tired of feeling less than others</e1>, that <e2>whenever i try to do what i think is good and help others and they despise my help and also tell me that i am wrong in what i do</e2>. <e3>i feel so alone</e3>, <e4>i have so many friends and so much loneliness, my family almost never supports me and my father could not be at my most important stage to advise me</e4>.   my conflicts with my family are constant, with me and with each other, it is a total disaster and i am included in it, <e5>i even look like a black sheep</e5> for <e6>suffering certain anger problems</e6> but believe me that i do what i can to treat them as with meditation and other advice given by psychologists but there come times where they act unfairly towards my actions, i seek the common good with them, i swear, and yet they tell me that they are wrong.<e7>i came here in search of a place to express myself and in a way to release ""stress""</e7>.<e8>i did not come looking for attention but if someone thinks they can help i thank</e8>"

"im somehow somewhat up for a promotion. although i have had several major screwups recently so maybe not so much now. <e1>i hate my job</e1> and <e2>it exacerbates a number of major issues i have from working too much to other compulsive issues  to absolutely destroying my will to do anything</e2>. im not great at it but im at the experience level o need to movie on whether that is as a promotion or moving internally.im supposed to talk with my manager about what my goals are. but <e3>im too depressed to do anything</e3> and <e4>if i agree to a promotion, thats willfully writing off another year of life dedicated to something i know will be all consuming and keep me a state i hate</e4>."

"its come to the point where <e1>i try</e1> because <e2>i dont want people to say i didnt</e2>. but really, i just want to give up. <e3>i feel useless, unneeded, desperate for some kind of positive feeling that lasts more than a day</e3>. <e4>my heart feels heavy and i cry about everything, it feels like i never run out of tears like people say i should</e4>. they just keep pouring out and with them, my soul. my world is falling apart at the seams and i cant seem to tell if i caused all of it or not. <e5>the voices in my head are getting louder as the days go on</e5> and <e6>what was once easy to ignore is becoming impossible</e6>. i can quite literally feel my heart cracking in my chest everyday, and i cant mend it. im giving up, and i dont know who to tell."

"coming out of a depressive episode whether it lasted 2 days or 2 months is such a refreshing feeling. it's like when you get the flu and you realize you took your health for granted and then when you finally feel better, you appreciate what it's like to be healthy.at least that's what it feels like for me. <e1>i try not to think about all the time i wasted and instead make the most of the day when i'm feeling good and do the things</e1> that make me <e2>happy</e2>. like today <e3>i decided to finally write this paper that i've been putting off for weeks</e3>, and it makes me <e4>happy</e4> to feel like i'm doing something productive. <e5>i also decided to go for a walk and get coffee and sit outside the coffee shop</e5> which made me <e6>happy</e6>.anyone else feel the same way?"

"this happens to me alot. i always have a feeling that<e1>i'm not really depressed</e1> because <e2>i have the physical capacity to just do what needs to be done in life (working, exercice and all that)</e2>. but then at the same time i'm always feeling so shitty about myself, no matter how good my life situation may be. <e3>sometimes on my way to work i would just imagine to get hit by a bus or a truck</e3> just to <e4>end this every day suffering</e4>.i would then have thoughts like : ""oh but you're not really depressed if you're able to live normaly, you're just faking it to get people's attention"".""oh and all those suicidal thoughts you're having are also fake, if you really wanted to do it you would've done it a long time ago""it's like on the outside i'm living life like a godamn robot, just going through my routine and acting ""normal"" but on the inside i'm just slowly dying and rotting away."

"school sucks, my body sucks, everyone sucks, everything sucks. today is eid. yet i'm making this sad post in here. being a muslim with depression is horrible. the amount of judgement and scrutiny i can't handle it. <e1>the amount of questions i was asked about how demonic i am and a demonic force is in the works</e1> is <e2>disgusting</e2>. <e3>i'm sad</e3> <e4>i have 0 to no followers on my insta art page</e4>. yes, my art is my whole life. <e5>i'm sad</e5> there's <e6>no one to look at it</e6>. <e7>i'm sad about everything</e7>. <e8>i'm failing school</e8>. it just started and i'm already scoring low. i suck. i should just cease to exist."

"<e1>im pissed</e1>. there was this person on tiktok talking about how she was finally able to take a shower and do her work because <e2>shes depressed</e2> and <e3>its obviously hard for her</e3>, but when i went into the comments, </e4>they were all making fun of her</e4>.what the fuck.<e5>it pisses me off how everyone in the comments think theyre so quirky and cute</e5> because <e6>theyre making fun of her for finally being able to do something that is normal for them but hard for her to do</e6> because <e7>she has a mental illness</e7>.theyre all about positive mindsets and promoting good mental health until they finally see the effects mental illnesses really have on people, and it sucks.imagine how hard for her it was to see comments making fun of her. istg <e8>i cant stand people on tiktok</e8>,<e9> theyre horrible and lack empathy.this is why people dont open up about things like this</e9>. <e10>its people like them who dont even try to understand other people</e10> just because <e11>theyre doing something thats not considered normal in their eyes that are part of the problem</e11>.you dont even need to fully understand someone to be there for them and to care for them."

"every single night.they're laughing at me. they're exposing me. they're talking trash and they're insulting me harsher and harsher. <e1>they're making me feel small and unwanted</e1> and <e2>every single night i wake up crying</e2> because of it.they're just vessels for my insecurities to speak through, but what they're saying is right.<e3>they don't know they're saying it</e3>, <e4>because they're not saying it</e4>.but it feels like them.it feels like what i fear deep down they really think of me.and i hate myself for letting it affect the way i think of them."
<e1>need help</e1> <e2>feeling sad and depressed feel down</e2>

"its really insane how cruel life can be. like i dont see how life is a fluke at all honestly. this shit feels like a set up. <e1>i hate science</e1> for <e2>not telling it like it is</e2>. lifes a damn hell simulation idk why there isn't enough evidence in the world for that  by now. i think my own life is brutal and i've nearly killed myself yet i cant even fathom that its true how others have it much worse. anyways i don't think ill be alive much longer. <e3>i'm threatened to be kicked out for ' being lazy '</e3> because <e4>i am too depressed to work and can't find a job</e4>. i don't got much money to survive long. i got enough money to buy what i need to kill myself. since i don't believe in god anymore i might aswell just do it. lifes fucking hell"

"honestly, <e1>having a crush feels really good</e1> because <e2>this has been the least bored ive been in really long</e2> . he's really caring and always checks up on me when i look upset but thats also the problem. <e3> i probably started liking him</e3>  because of </e4> he concern he shows me</e4>  but what if kne day he just gets sick and tired of me being so depressed all the time. <e5>i always heard that being in a relationship with someone with depression is a bad idea and that it does affect the other person in the relationship negatively</e5> so <e6> im unsure if i should pursue him</e6>  :( i also dont think my depression is going away anytime soon"
i wish i could just die. right now i am looking over a 40 story  balcony but i know i have to stay alive. i want to go home and see my family but i feel so ashamed hiding in my house.

"every morning i wake up from whatever dream im having and my first thought is fuck. <e1>every single fucking morning i am completely crushed by the fact that im going to have to be conscious for the next ~16 hours</e1>. <e2>i hate it</e2>."

"recently i started being skeptical about my understanding around depression, i always thought that i am strong and this can't happen to me and depression is an intense form of sadness and down vibes.<e1>last month was just too much for me i have red alerts around me coming from every direction</e1> and <e2>i just can't fix or work on anything</e2>, its not laziness its more like waiting for stuff to fix themselves. and above all of it i have to 'stay strong' and just get through with it.even though i always thought i was strong and i can take on anything and stay strong, but <e3>getting hit from every direction at the same time with intensity getting higher and higher</e3> just <e4>torn me down</e4>.<e5>i don't feel sad for myself</e5>, because <e6>i know i have it way better than other people</e6>, but i feel sad for them and i feel like i am empty, hopeless, powerless, voiceless, and i feel like i am nothing and no one, and if believe no one feels anything towards me and i present nothing to anyone.""

"<e1>i'm not sure</e1> it's because <e2>i have work in the morning after a day off</e2> or <e3>taking my meds late but lately</e3>, i have been feeling meh about life. nothing is fun anymore, i just bought myself a switch with two games and i'm already bored of it after less than a week. it's just the same thing every day, go to work, get bullied at work by an asshole of a co-worker, cry at home or say fuck it and walk home from work crying and not wait on a ride. <e4>i want to lose weight but i don't want to do anything about it</e4>, <e5>i feel worthless most days</e5>. i want to fix myself so i can start looking for that someone but it's like i ran out of care and the only love i get is from lucid dreams. i haven't been held in months. i don't want to die but i'm just extremely meh with how things are."
"<e1>this shit is annoying and i hate that my tears will just roll down in the wrong moments instead of whenever i'm alone</e1>, it's tiring <e2>being anxious and depressed</e2>..."

i'm even having a few suicidal thoughts but i guess i'm still very much at a better place than where i was. i hate every aspect of myself and i just wanna disappear. there are just too many bigots in the world no matter where i see even in the safe spaces. i feel like i'll never be able to belong and find a good/supportive friend group. even if i do i'll probably forever be in doubt that if they really are my friends or are pretending to be.

"it can also make me intensely aware of the tiniest of 'happy things'.like the thing that inspired me to make this post: my ginger cat is sleeping peacefully beside me on the couch, and sometimes as he's fast asleep i can't help but gently pet him.the fact that <e1>he trusts me and the peace in our house</e1> enough to <e2>not be startled</e2>, but instead do the stretch+snoot hug...there's something about having and honouring the complete trust given to me by an(y) animal, it's so pure.anyway, i hope this doesn't come across as toxic positivity, i certainly don't mean it to be that way. <e3>today is just a rare day i'm acutely aware of the love i have for tiny things some people don't seem to notice, or take for granted</e3>. <e4>the darkness i see and feel is still interrupted by tiny shiny stuff every now and then, and so far apparently that has been enough</e4>. </e5>today i am thankful for that</e5>."

"so i'm not exactly sure if this belongs here but characters in books have it so easy in a way. they have a clear goal in life, frodo must return the ring, harry must defeat voldemort, in many books characters usually know what their purpose is. and then when they fulfill this purpose they have their ending. the book ends and so do the characters. the world siezes to exists with them fulfilled and happy. and this is so beautiful. the act of ending at a right time. in life i feel like there is something i'm searching for but i don't know what it is or whether i i'll ever find it. and so i sometimes envy them so much. and i don't want to die but im not sure what i live for. or whether people do need to live for something. we could make an argument that <e1>not having anything set in stone for oneself is great</e1> because <e2>they can choose</e2>, but that's the problem. what to choose?  i just wanted to get this out."

"so (i might be on the wrong sub for this stuff, but i didn't know, where to ask) for a few years now i have symptoms of a depression and my best friends always try to get me to a psychologist to get a diagnosis, but i don't know if it's worth it...i don't know, how it's in other regions of the world, but at least in the part of germany, where i live it's stupidly difficult to get a place for a therapy. some friends of mine have to wait for 9 months until they can start therapy.this wouldn't be a problem for me, but afaik if i got diagnosed, i would be forced to lay down my position as a member of the voluntary fire fighters, which is the only thing holding my life together in this weird times...and since <e1>my family isn't really supportive about mental issues</e1>, it feels like <e2>it's not worth sacrificing my favorite hobby and breaking with my family for the possibility that i might could get better someday</e2>.propably nobody will read this, but i wanted to say thank you, if you did. even if you don't say anything"

"let me start by saying that today i'm ok. some external factors have had me pretty low and i've just about got them wrapped up.<e1>i missed a day this week</e1> because <e2>i wasn't ok</e2>, and <e3>my boss needs some form of doctors note or it counts as one of two no excuse needed absences for the year</e3>.it's more complicated and less terrible than it sounds, i don't want to get into it. my job is fine.my insurance sucks, looks like a cost of about $120 everywhere i'm looking. any suggestions?"

"<e1>i'm having a really bad episode rn</e1> as <e2>this is a hard time of year for me</e2> due to <e3>grieving</e3>. i tried so hard to prevent it. i thought i was gonna be stronger than this but here i am with a messy apartment...dishes from a month ago still in the sink. too ashamed for anyone to come over. <e4>too ashamed to go out on a date</e4> from <e5>binge eating and falling off track on my weight loss journey</e5>. hygiene not the best right now but i finally showered today after 3 days. and <e6>i'm scared to lose the new person i've been talking to</e6> because of <e7>this disorder</e7>. i dont want to be seen like this."

e spent the past year and a half comfortable with where i was, and <e1>too scared of getting better</e1> cause <e2>its been such an unknown feeling</e2> and i have a fear of the unknown anyway. ive turned to drugs before (mainly ketamine) and it was a temporary fix but never worked out. same with self harm.today i sat down and made a list of the things i want to do by 2022. preferably i want to complete the list by my 18th birthday (october), but im saying 2022 to give me some extra leeway.i dont know if this is the right place to post this but im finally ready to start my recovery and im finally feeling like i could actually get better."

"im sick and tired of the same old bullshit day in and day out. <e1>im in the process of starting a new job which made me happy</e1> because <e2>i hate my current one</e2>, however that joy was stolen by some fuckwads that decided to stir shit up yesterday. fuck people, fuck covid, and fuck life"

"all of it is coming back. i'm four months off of my antidepressants and it's all coming back like my proces meant nothing. all the years fighting my depression are wasted and it just truly shows that it's not just a ""period"" of my life. it is my life. and <e1>i can't talk to anybody about it</e1>, because <e2>i'm embarrassed and too proud to admit that i'm not strong enough</e2>."

"whenever i feel heavy form of depression, or just feeling like i'm not doing something right i've punch myself really hard in either my forehead or on the top of my head. i've told my gf how it leads to this and how she is not good for my mental health when she is unsympathetic towards me regarding this issue. she keeps telling me she doesn't want this to happen and it seems genuine, but today i was trying to help her zip up her dress and <e1>she kept yelling at me</e1> for <e2>not doing it right</e2>. <e3>i felt small and stupid</e3> and <e4>right after i couldn't do it i sat down and punched myself hard in the forehead</e4>. it's not for attention (at least not consciously) and i've never done it in front of her before but all she said was ""seriously?"" and <e5>started getting dressed</e5> because <e6>she had to work on an assignment</e6>.am i wrong for thinking this? i know its wrong to hit myself, but i can't help but feel anger towards her for reacting like that."

"i have literally no one in my life and will be spending my 20-something birthday alone this year crying.<e1>i dont want to exist for the rest of my life crying alone on my birthday, getting slowly more depressed every year</e1>. <e2>i need a suicide booth for a comfortable death tbh</e2>."

"i just needed to get this off my chest.i'm currently sitting in bed, drinking coffee, unable to move from my spot for the past 2 hours. i'm just staring at the wall.i should be working. i'm technically supposed to be working from home. but i've been up since 4am, and though i usually workout to numb my mind,  my body has 0 energy to hardly move today. i just couldn't do it.my company has a shitty pto policy so <e1>i couldn't even call in</e1>, due to<e2> pre-scheduled time off for a future medical procedure</e2>.i just wanted someone to hear me out, i guess. if i talk to the usual people i talk to, i either get a half ass apology or get told to pick myself up by the bootstraps and carry on..depression is a horrible, horrible ailment, and no one gives 2 shits about it. society still stigmatizes it, work calls it a cop out, and <e3>i'm so tired of not being able to afford proper therapy and medication</e3> because of <e4>american healthcare</e4>.today, i'm just so thoroughly exhausted. all the way down to my bones."

"when i started math 11 this year, i decided i wanted to finally commit to something and do well. i tried my absolute hardest in class and spent many hours studying at home. i put so much time and effort into this, thinking i could finally be as good as my friends. my mom was so proud of how determined i was.well <e1>i just failed the exam</e1> and now <e2>i want to curl up and die</e2>."

"i'm no-one, i don't even like to reread my posts. <e1>i've always been sorta spiritual</e1>, so <e2>i didn't think depression could truly hit me</e2>, but it did, yeah. <e3>i'm even afraid to turn music on</e3>, cause <e4>i know i won't be able to enjoy it the way i used</e4>, but maybe i will. i still fear it. all i can is stare at that wall and do nothing, this is bullshit really"

"i cant do this anymore i broke today. <e1>i cried to the point where i couldnt breathe</e1>, which <e2>i havent done in a while</e2>. im so mentally and physically drained i literally can not do this anymore. <e3>i fucking hate myself</e3> and <e4>im stuck here with no way to kill myself</e4>. im so alone, nobody would even expect me to kill myself. i thought i was at my lowest a couple months ago but i keep getting lower somehow. i have 5 assignments due tomorrow and i have started none of them... <e5>my dog is scared of me</e5> because <e6>im crying</e6> please help."

"<e1>i cant hold a job and have no money to do anything</e1>. <e2>my mom is still taking care of me</e2>. <e3>i feel ashamed about it</e3>. i dont know what i can do. even showering seems like a luxury i dont deserve. <e4>i want to be in therapy</e4> to <e5>be able to say i did something to try</e5>. theres so many people struggling it makes me feel even worse. why should i get help instead? i really wish i would just go to sleep one day and never wake up. i feel like a burden on everyone. life would be much better if i would stop being a drag. who cares. im just one stupid idiot who knows what he has to do and wont do any of it."

"i really feel like this. i don't understand life and i don't think i'm capable of, at least, some real level of understanding. i feel too dumb for this, even though i've always considered myself smart. i look around me and see so many depressed people from our generation. i look in the mirror and i just don't understand who i am anymore.it's like, before i distract myself with smth i find interesting (hooray, it's still possible!), i'm just nothingness floatin' behind 2 eyeballs. no one really matters, u can make things feel important to you (thanks, human psyche!), all we have is this life, but there's nothing more, no matter how hard u try to search. u can only distract yourself before you die, that's it.sometimes, when i think about it,i actually truly feel like not being born or dying just nowwould be a more real/truthful option,than ""accepting"" everything and going on with your life.<e1>don't kill yourself</e1>, though, cause <e2>u might miss out on smth cool in the future lol</e2>"

"so <e1>its been a long time since i had depression or felt depressed</e1>. <e2>i am very good at finding ways to avoid it or talk it out with someone</e2>. but that someone i have always turned to is going through personal things and i dont want to burden them with my stuff.i know what triggered <e3>my depression</e3>. it was <e4>work</e4> that triggered it. i love my job, but just yesterday due to <e5>overwhelming things to do</e5>, <e6>my supervisor got irritated with my scheduling process</e6>. <e7>i guess i wish the reprimand was in private, not in front of my other coworkers</e7>, <e8>i felt humiliated and embarrassed</e8>. and i do not even know why i am taking their comment so personal either, they are not even my boss, they are just a supervisor. <e9>another coworker</e9> also makes me <e10>feel very tense as i enter and mentally attacked as i leave the office</e10>. and <e11>i dont want to tell my boss</e11> because <e12>we are short staffed</e12>.anyways, thanks for listening/reading. and i will eventually leave this place, but not right now."
"<e1>i'm depressed</e1> <e2>my eye lids are dark</e2> and <e3>my family enjoys fucking me into this state</e3>. i don't want to wake up anymore what should i do?"

"hi, i am a 24 years old man with a good life, i have some hobbies i have a good job that i like but recently i started to become bored with life. it's not like i want to die right now but i think there is nothing exciting going to happen future maybe expect few moments. i'm thinking of death through hanging or some medicines. please don't respond me with some shit like ""life is beautiful"". i wanted this post to be longer but in the middle of text <e1>i decided i don't want to write more</e1> so <e2>it's kind of shitpost sorry for that</e2>"

"im losing the battle, but i used to write songs and poetry to cope. reddit amateur here, if i break rules dont be afraid to tell me. this is just for anyone in a similar situation, any critique/thoughts on the poem would help. thankssad truthsdead flowers left with nothing but weeds like how your wants banish your needs life lived by the rules a tortured soul born to lose how many hints to take? how many clues? mind games play you sun shines when your down then sets when your up after the fall its hard to move on when you cant move at all maybes just the echo of never meant to be"

"i cant do this anymore. <e1>my life just keeps getting worse and i just keep pretending to be ok in front of people</e1>, but when i get home <e2>i fall apart</e2>. i am so <e3>sad</e3> that <e4>i can physically feel it in my chest</e4>. went to college today and they literally had a long discussion and completely forgot i was in the room at the back of the classroom. just proves how invisible and worthless i am. i fucked up my childhood and i have no hope for my future. i am going to kill myself sometime soon.sorry that i sound like a stupid bitch"

"hi, im looking for advice as a friend of someone with anxiety and depression. a few weeks ago they said it would be better off if we stopped talking for a while, and we havent spoken since. <e1>theyve been suicidal in the past and their activity online indicates signs of loneliness</e1>, so <e2>im getting concerned</e2>.i want to reach out and initiate some sort of conversation, but im not sure how to go about it or if that would be disrespecting any boundaries. when you push someone away, would you prefer them to reach out after a while or continue to give you space? thanks for any help."

"i started crying and called my boss over to let him know that im not feeling well obviously and then a shit show came to be where a customer was waiting at a register and my boss is calling everyone up front. one person to put money in a register, called 2 people up to be a cashier and <e1>i felt so embarrassed</e1> bc <e2>im just there crying and they're just looking at me</e2>. i cant help but feel them being upset at me and i just feel like a burden. <e3>i understand i have responsibilities to do and i hate myself for not being able to do my job and crying and making everyone do more work</e3> bc <e4>i'm too inadequate</e4>."

"so <e1>recently i feel very exhausted and tired</e2> from <e2>all the bullshits around me</e2>. i have a prom these days, parties and all the stuffs for graduation but i have no energy for anything. everybody around me are very happy and seem to have fun but not me. i know this is the best moment of every student's life and all but i can't enjoy it and i think some day i will regret it. i dont have motivation for anything and the exams are in one week. <e3>they are very important</e3> because <e4>my life is depending on them. please tell me what to do</e4>. what's wrong with me?""

"is anyone else the happy friend? so <e1>everytime you tell your friend your not fine they don't take it seriously</e1> and <e2>think you're joking</e2>. i hate this, <e3>i was forcing myself to always laugh about shit</e3> so <e4>they think i'm fine</e4> but now i'm stuck i' this category and no one takes me seriously"

i've been having suicidal thoughts again today. i know i'm not ready to commit a suicide but the thoughts are here again. and <e1>i've just had an argument with a friend</e1> and it makes me <e2>feel worthless</e2>.

"<e1>depression</e1> has made me so <e2>numb</e2>, <e3>ive lost all sort of regular emotion</e3>, which is bad enough. but now ive lost the connection ive had for others that meant a lot (or barely nothing) to me.i dont dislike them, but i dont like them either. even those that i strongly disliked in the past im completely meh to now.<e4>feeling in general is such a chore for me, and dedicating emotion to multiple people leaves me so drained</e4> that <e5>my brain has just stopped trying</e5>. i feel like a horrible, shltty person, i want to know people again. i want to feel people again. all i see now are just walking pieces of flesh. <e6>i dont see people</e6> and <e7>it scares me</e7>. if i do feel anything, i feel fear. i fear that ill lose my family, i fear that ill lose my friends ive known my entire life, and i fear that ill lose my s/o.has anyone else experienced this? am i just mentally broken? is this normal??  im lost, im scared, and im drained. i just dont know what to do."

"tw: self harm i didnt know where else to write this so i just chose here. lately ive been wanting to do weird things. <e1>ive been showering whilst wearing clothes</e1> and ive started to do that a lot. <e2>im not insecure about my body</e2> but i like the feel of showering in my clothes. <e3>ive also been cutting myself a lot</e3>. <e4>i like the feel of the blood running down my arm and the burn of the blade</e4>. ive been getting thoughts in my head to hurt people or purposely upset them. and when i get home from school i straight away just sleep. <e5>sometimes i sleep in school</e5> because <e6>im tired a lot of the time</e6>. i dont expect anyone to respond i just wanted to tell someone"

"i don't know if this question belongs here, but i can't talk to my therapist anytime soon and this is really on my mind... the last days, i found pictures of my friends, my family and me in various places over the last years. in quite a lot of cases, i didn't even remember being there with them or doing certain things. before seeing these things, i could have sworn i didn't do certain things. my memory used to be basically photografic until i developed a severe depression last summer, <e1>i stopped taking antidepressants three weeks ago</e1> and <e2>i am ""back to life""...</e2>could maybe anyone relate somehow to this?"

getting addicted to a losing game.i spent my whole life waiting for someone and she finally came just to die she committed suicide and why did i not see it that she was depressed and i did nothing nothing at all.until it was to late

"well firstly <e1>there's a bit of guilt</e1> there for <e2>not picking it up</e2> when i pick stuff like that up with other people. so <e3>he told me mw about it this morning</e3> and i don't know what to say to him. i just said that i'm glad he's getting help and that i'll check in on him more often. we're not extremely close but i want to be there for him. i just don't know how"

"im constantly told by family members about everything thats wrong with me, even if they dont mean to imply it. i cant speak to any family about my mental health without them turning it into some lecture on how i need to be more social and stop being lazy. <e1>im failing school</e1>, <e2>im scared that i might not even pass my sophomore year</e2>,<e3> i feel like a failure</e3>.<e4> im constantly belittled by family</e4>, and <e5>it affects me greatly</e5>. i just want to give up. im always the odd one out of my cousins, theyre so different from me, they always hang out and im left at home. i feel invisible at family gatherings, im definitely not the life of the party and i hate being the center of attention. its getting harder and harder to hide my depression, ill be fine and then ill find myself staring off into no where with overwhelming thoughts clouding my head. like maybe no one would notice if i wasnt even here."

"i wish i could just fall asleep and never wake up. im so fucking <e1>tired</e1> of </e2>people telling me how i should just hang in there or some stupid bullshit</e2>. i wish i had no family or friends so i could just kill myself already. <e3>im so tired</e3>. <e4>i wish i could sleep all day</e4>. <e5>sometimes i dont even try to get out of bed </e5>and <e6>i get shouted at</e6>. sometimes all i can feel is just anger. i dont know what im angry at but i just get so angry. <e7>sometimes i wish i could murder somebody</e7> just to <e8>know what its like</e8>. im so tired of studying. im so tired of doing anything. <e9>im so tired</e9> <e10>i just want to sleep</e10>. the only time people message me is when they want to send stupid shit or need something from me. <e11>whenever i try to talk to them they just end up leaving</e11>.<e12>im so tired of trying</e12>."

"i know you shouldn't act out of depression like you shouldn't act out of being drunk.but i can't help iti am so utterly <e1>alone</e1>.<e2> i want someone to love me</e2>. <e3>i want someone to look excited when i come home</e3>.<e4> i want to cuddle</e4>. and i have so much free time it is slowly killing me.i know i can't care for it. <e5>my apartment doesn't allow pets</e5>. <e6>my parents would kill me</e6>.<e7>i would have to care for it's health and pay extra taxes</e7>.still i just want a puppy"

"yeah, <e1>it fuckin sucks</e1>. <e2>being lonely feels like shit</e2>.<e3> the only people i interact with are my parents, my brother and my therapist</e3>. who wants such a life?and the worst part is that my parents and brother dont understand me and my problems. <e4>im lucky</e4> <e5>i have my therapist</e5>. but only having 1 person you trust doesnt feel very good.<e6>its not like i miss my old friends</e6>, cause hey, fuck them, <e7>their loss</e7>, but <e8>i just want new friends</e8>. and thats <e9>when social anxiety comes in</e9>. fuckin anxiety kills me.does anyone wanna talk? ill be glad to even hear other peoples problems."

"<e1>i didnt have the best childhood</e1> but it wasnt terrible either. <e2>it left me intense abandonment issues and anxious avoidant attachment style</e2>. <e3>i dont really trust or feel close to anyone in my life</e3>. and its causing me to<e4> disassociate a lot</e4>. i live with my boyfriend right now but if we broke up id have to move back in with my abusive mother. <e5>neither of these options are great for me right now</e5>.<e6>i just want to be alone</e6> <e7>im tired</e7> of <e8>the pain im in caused by the relationships i have with other people</e8>."

"<e1>im really lonely lately</e1>. <e2>ive been trying to date but the only girls that ask me out are poly</e2>, and i cant do that. (please dont try to convince me to, it makes me wanna die) all the monogamous girls i meet wanna stay friends.i feel isolated and like im not good enough for anyone."

"i graduated 2 years ago and i am still jobless. my parents had high expectations of me but <e1>i feel like i couldn't deliver</e1>. <e2>i do 3 things, eat, sleep, use smartphone and masturbate</e2>. i don't even enjoy masturbating. <e3>i only do masturbate</e3> because <e4>i feel uncomfortable feeling in testicles< if i don't</e4>. because of <e5>spending all day watching phone/tv</e5>, <e6>i suffer from bacterial infections</e6> but for <e7>some reasons</e7> <e8>i am caring less and less about my health</e8>. i rather lye down on my bed then to get up and take medicine. i have very little motivation to do things. i see no future ahead. because of <e9>less caring about my health</e9>, <e10>i have lost half of my hairs and will be completely bald soon</e10>. <e11>my hand and voice shakes while talking to some specific people</e11>."

"i lack the slightest bit of necessary motivation or initiative to put any real effort into college, but <e1>i care</e1> enough to <e2>loathe myself for it</e2>; to say im a failure is an understatement, but my family still have an irrational amount of faith in me. all that and i still have an unearned, desperate desire for validation.<e3>apologies</e3> for <e4>my incoherent rambling</e4>, i just wanted to express my self-hatred to something besides my mirror, i hope you have a pleasant day (:"
feeling low since weeks now. ah everything feels unreal. i feel like i don't know who i am.

"this ramadan, like the one before it and the one before that, has been rough. by the time the month is over, i always <e1>find myself feeling guilty</e1> for <e2>not making the most out of it</e2>.but your mental health matters and god knows how much we suffer.eid mubarak! if youre alone this eid or dont have any friends or family to celebrate with, or if you dont feel like celebrating at all...if youre feeling more depressed than usual...struggling with emotional disturbances or mood swings and have no one to talk to...whatever it is...please know youre not alone and id love to be friends."

<e1>i've came to a point whereby i feel that i don't have a will to survive</e1>.<e2>i just have this feeling deep inside of me that everything in the world is weighing me down and i just can't seem to put myself back up</e2>. <e3>i feel like at this point i have fucked up too many things in my life and i just don't know how people live happily and go about every single thing in life</e3>. <e4>deep down i want to get better at everything but i just don't know how</e4>. anyone else feels me?

"i don't really matter. i have a spouse and only one parent still alive although she is quite old and in very poor health. spouse and i have discussed divorce so really after that it is just my mom. <e1>i don't get people wanting to hang out, talk</e1>, etc. <e2>i have people that i call ""friends"" but really are just associates or friend of friend types</e2>. <e3>they are nice enough and do the whole like things posted of social media but never really engage kind of relationship</e3>. <e4>i am somehow mad, sad, and just overwhelmed all at the same time</e4>. i want to scream and cry all together.i don't want to die per se but i'm so <e5>lonely</e5>. <e6>just that sense that comes when you realize nothing would really change for anyone if i were not here</e6>. not sure people would even notice honestly. <e7>i wish i lived in the past</e7> <e8>when you could hop on a ship and reinvent yourself in a new country</e8>. now everything is digital and immigration is so tight that is seems like you are stuck wherever you were born."
"does any one else start <e1>feeling depressed all the sudden</e1> and start <e2>sobbing</e2>, all alone, then you see yourself in the mirror and just think youre doing it for attention?"

"<e1>i always feel like the most selfish person on the planet</e1>, that <e2>all i can think about is how sad i am and how everything is impacting my life</e2>. <e3>i think of all the things my family has done for me</e3> and <e4>how selfish it is to feel how i feel</e4>. i would never say the word depressed out loud, my family make jokes about how i sleep 12+ hours every night and am still tired, i cry every week yet <e5>everyone makes jokes that im a robot</e5> because <e6>i never cry</e6>. <e7>i keep this all hidden</e7> and yet <e8>i always feel like its just my selfish mind looking for attention and that i am not actually sad</e8>, i dont deserve to be."

"<e1>i feel so overwhelmed by the people and things in my life recently</e1>.<e2>i just need some time and space away</e2>.<e3>id like to dive into a pool of deep water and curl up into a ball</e3>.<e4>close my eyes as the bubbles swirl to the surface where nobody can penetrate</e4>.<e5>i want to sink to the bottom and lay in a field of flowers and just rest</e5>.<e6>im so weary</e6>. <e7>im so tired</e7>.<e8> im so exhausted</e8>.<e9>i just want peace</e9>.<e10>leave me alone to sleep for a while</e10>. <e11>im so drained</e11>. <e12>i have nothing to offer anymore</e12>.</e13>just leave me alone</e13>."

"<e1>in about a week my doctor will put me on antidepressants</e1> which is honestly the only reason why <e2>im still alive right now</e2>. people always say that its all within yourself and that only you can make you change but <e3>ive been dealing with severe depression for over a year now</e3> and <e4>ive realized that being happy is out of my power</e4>. i hope they work because <e5>if they dont</e5> then <e6>im out of here</e6>"

"i do not know if i want to exist anymore. there doesn't seem to be any point in trying. <e1>everyday that i wake up, i find it so tiresome</e1>. <e2>i feel so drained</e2>. <e3>i feel utterly sad</e3>. and at that point of time i just want a hug, to be able to lie down and be okay with myself. but the truth is i am not okay, <e4>i am tired of putting up a facade for the people in my life</e4>, because <e5>my family doesn't like this sad me</e5>. i have been diagnosed with severe depression for over a year now, but i have struggled with it for as long as i can remember. meds do not help me, neither does therapy. honestly my therapist gives me more feedback than listening, though she is trying to help, it misses the mark. i only have lost dreams now and no way to regain what i had, i just wish for there to be peace for me. <e6>too long i have had this screaming void inside of me, it won't stop spouting discouraging words</e6>. <e7>i just wish to feel peace</e7>."

"<e1>way too many people are depressed now and for good reason</e1>. <e2>do they even take us seriously anymore(not like they did before)</e2>. ive had depression for over a decade but since the pandemic i feel like im just categorized as one of the many. sucks to be alive."

"<e1>just venting</e1>...<e2>today i broke down really bad</e2>. <e3>my boyfriend was feeling down</e3> so <e4>to calm him down i told him that i love him</e4> a lotthen he asked ""why"". i thought about it a lot but really just... had no special reasons...he knows about my depression and he just said ""no reasons huh... maybe it's because <e5>you feel love starved</e5> that <e6>you come up to me</e6>. maybe you're lying about you feelings to have my attention, you always act so emotionless and empty.""i knew he was mad and didn't mean it but now i feel betrayed, sad and empty. he apologized and begged for mercy and i said it's ok and he only felt down that's why he said it.... i don't know what to do oh i'm such a drama queen."

"<e1>so i have found out my best friend is cutting herself</e1>. she already told me she has many problems but still didnt tell me what they exactly are. im trying my best to show her that i am with her if she needs me but one time i wasnt home she wrote me a long message i didnt read cuz <e2>i wasnt home</e2> and <e3>she deleted it quickly after.</e3> she doesnt eat enough neither is she sleeping for more than 4 hours. today she told me she stayed in the bathtub for half the night and she wanted to faint and possibly drown. all i know is that their parents (they are divorced) really shout at her she is useless and just angry with everyone all the  time. <e4>i am getting more worried every day</e4>. if anyone knows what more i can do please tell me cuz im running out of ideas."

"<e1>i have borderline personality disorder</e1>. <e2>i obviously get depressed</e2>. ive been depressed since i was 10. but <e3>my whole life, im talking</e3> since <e4>i can remember being alive</e4>. ive always been the person left out in groups. <e5>ive been in multiple friend groups but ive always been the person in the background that would get left out</e5>. in elementary school, middle school and high school. <e6>its very depressing</e6>. i am an introvert but my whole life ive tried fitting in. i have never fitted into any groups. and i am not sure why. has anyone else experienced this? and why do you think that is? edit: i get along with every group. im not the  weird kid. i look like im supposed to be popular but i have a unique personality i guess. i just dont fit in any groups whatsoever"

"don't be mad on me if my english so bad guys, i know a lot of people , some of thme say they love me and care about me but i don't feel it , i wake up everyday play the same game talk to online friends and study and go to sleep then repeat , <e1>i can't go out alone</e1> cause <e2>i feel so bad when i look to group of people and see them talking and smiling </e2>, i just feel i'm not a good person to have friends , also i have depression since i was 16."

"(i'm not sure if this is the right sub to post but pls hear me out)<e1>i pity for kids</e1> (especially those who have grown up as adults) <e2>whose problems (of every aspect: emotional, psychological, etc) that could've been resolved in their childhood days was just set aside by this false hope by parents</e2>. i'm one of those kids who's an adult nowi find it hard to attain closure. and <e3>all the more it's hard to open up</e3> cuz <e4>i'm a guy</e4>. my parents expect a lot. <e5>i'm very poor with dealing with stuff that aren't academic (personal goals, managing my own emotions, mingling with people, not soudning awkward on messenger, etc)</e5>. <e6>i also lost my first best friend (of 1 and a half year)</e6> because of <e7>borderline immature stuff i've did</e7>, all thanks to childhood neglect. <e8>i'm ashamed that at my age</e8>, even if i may sound professional in my own diction. <e9>i still think like a kid</e9>. nobody will be around for me to guide and support me."

"i mean for me are these two phases different. when <e1>i was depressed</e1>, <e2>i felt sad</e2>, tired of everything etc. but 3 years ago i really felt completely paralyzed. <e3>no feelings, no will, absolutely nothing</e3>.<e4> i remember crossing the streets a didn't care if some car will hit me</e4>. everyday was the same, i was just waiting all day to get sleep again. <e5>for me it wasn't depression</e5>, <e6>because i didn't feel anything</e6>. there was just an emptiness inside of me. <e7>well i overcame it 2 years ago</e7>, now <e8>i'm happiest i'ver ever been</e8>. i'm just curious if some other people see it like me."

<e1>i just want to lay in bed all day and sleep</e1>. <e2>i can't pay attention in school</e2> because <e3>i'm so tired</e3>. <e4>my grades are dropping</e4> and <e5>i have watched as my bright future was crushed into little tiny bits as i watched</e5>.<e6>i just don't enjoy anything anymore</e6>.
why oh why did this horrible f*cking curse had to crush me every single day of my sad excuse for existence...

"i recently started talking to a new psychiatrist through the va and one of the things he mentioned to me was that i have taken around 20 different psych meds. 20! thats including anti-depressants, anti-anxiety, anti-psychotic, and even something for bi-polar disorder (which they told me i didnt have). and none of them have worked. he is my third or fourth psychiatrist and i am on my seventh counselor/therapist (no i am not choosing to move around they seem to get tired of dealing with me).i am at a point where i feel like they are simply giving me some kind of false hope they are trying to help me. it feels like they havent done anything different in the last 7-8 years. they seem to focus on trying to treat the symptoms (unsuccessfully) than anything else. i feel like im the only one concerned about my mental health. like i believe there is something physically wrong with my brain from exposure to something while i was in the military that mimics mental disorders.i dont know what i have to do to get these people to take me seriously."

"<e1>the  paranoid, accusations, and depression anxiety, anger issues and drama,  withdrawing more and more and acting like a bitch throughout my school  years</e1>, now <e2>im alone with 0 friends irl</e2> whereas i used to be so close to 7  of them in a group, now <e3>they all hate me and done with me, probably  talk shit about me too together</e3> because of <e4>how much of a reject i was</e4>,  <e5>one even deleted me on facebook</e5>, <e6>i feel so lonely</e6> as <e7>i play video games  by myself</e7> and <e8>have almost nobody to talk to</e8>, whereas i used to play with them all the time, and go out with them all the time, what a sad reality."

"i'm so tired of this pain, i can't honestly take it anymore. i'm angry and resentful, all while being anxious and beyond depressed. i wish i wasn't hideous, i wish i wasn't so scared of everything, i wish i had at least one good physical trait, i wish my personality wasn't so weird that no one wants to stick around... i wish i were normal.i'm tired of being alone and beyond unattractive to the opposite sex, i miss the old drive for life i used to have. i care about nothing anymore, none of the hobbies i once enjoyed bring me any pleasure.i would give anything to feel normal for five minutes. i'm so tired..."

"ive got a friend that has been recently trying to help me through my depression but i feel like im a burden on him. he gives me such good advice and says hell be open always to talk. ive started playing with his friend group they are all like 2-3 years older than me(im 17).  <e1>i feel like he feels sympathy for me and invites me</e1> cause <e2>he knows i dont have anyone else to play games with</e2>. i just feel like its wrong that hes doing all this, even though i know he wants to help me get better. <e3>i feel like its bad that hes trying to include me</e3> cause <e4>how sad i am most of the time</e4>. wont it make him sad? ive read that you should surround yourself around positive people. but if im the problem is it even good for his mental health to constantly talk about depression?"

im finding that i am distancing myself from family.  if i invite them to my house they either give a last minute excuse or other just havent stayed in touch. i had covid and one particular cousin didnt even ask me who i was in the 12 weeks i was bed bound.then ill ill find that family will come and visit family that live near me but wont pop in to mine.im now feeling just distancing my self from them is making me feel its the right thing to do.  i keep telling myself if you dont see people you cant fall out with them.am i depressed or normal and this is exactly how these people should be dealt with ?

"when depression starts taking over in the middle of something. i have mdd (and gad, and adhd) and i'm at work for the first time in months. first half of the day went okay but now intrusive thoughts are making me shut down. i'm hiding around corners trying not to totally shut down or break down and i'm mustering all of my acting skills but i just don't know how i'm going to get through the week."

i don't do much these days but i'm still exhausted and some days like today it is a really small think that breaks something deep in me free and i'm at the edge of breaking down... i wanne cut but i don't do it.. i wanne speak about it but there is no one that i can open myself to. <e1>i hate myself</e1> for the way <e2>my brain brings things together and pups me up with old feelings and a security that it will never change</e2>..  i think i m at my worst but no it goes deeper and deeper down and i wish my "worst" from 2017 back i can deal with that but r know i'm on a next level of worst and don't get me wrong but <e3>it hurt me so much</e3> to <e4>see peoepl get help</e4> and <e5>thy make progress</e5> and <e6>it goes up and down</e6>... yeah i'm happy for them and thy deserve it soo much but why can't i get help or have a good change? i'm really trying i know it is not much but... it is all i can do and still not enough to make a change..

me and my bf were going to have a threesum and recently weve been arguing and hes said he doesnt think he loves me and hes said he doesnt wanna marry me- weve been together nearly 5yrs. im bisexual he just wants a threesum said cool found someone but we started arguing and stuffits just that hes now more into the idea and says he can do things he wont do with me with the other girl and idk i just feel so assi didnt mind before but i feel like hes saying shit to make me feel insecure lol

"<e1>quarantine</e1> really changed my life for the worse. <e2>i got diagnosed with several intolerances</e2>, <e3>lost a lot of weight</e3>, <e4>got an eating disorder</e4>. had something with a boy that told me he wasnt interested in dating in the end. its been 10 months. it still hurts. im not over him. my eating disorder made me lose most of my hair. worst feeling ever. during an recovery attempt i spiraled into binge eating. its a never ending circle of binging and starving. i hate my body. no matter how hard i try, im not able to open up to anyone. i am overwhelmed with my whole life. im turning 18 this year. i feel like i wasted so much of my youth. i feel like a loser. my self confidences been hitting rock bottom recently. everything seems overwhelming and worthless. im so afraid of growing up, i feel bad for my younger self from back then, being excited for its teenage years. i cant believe im failing while trying so hard. i wish i was able to cry on someones shoulder. but i just cant open up. its horrible."

"i didnt choose to be born. i have a tremendous need for freedom, but i dont believe there is such a thing.to me, you can never truly be free. you have to make choices within the realm of reality that you exist in; within the laws and beliefs of your land; within the expectations of those who love and care about you. <e1>even in death theres no freedom</e1> because <e2>theres no self left over to experience it</e2>.nothing that i truly desire is possible. detaching myself from life will only make me empty and sterile. further attaching myself to life will lead to terrible mental anguish. i dont have the mental clarity for suicide.i feel uncomfortable everywhere. i feel distant from everyone. every conversation, every thought, every feeling only touches me on the surface but never in my core.nothing really feels real or worth experiencing."

my depression wasn't presented since birth it's episodic i was normal for the first 20 years of my life but i developed endogenous depression this year meaning it wasn't due to life circumstances and it's biological ( characterized by anhedonia and non response to psychotherapy ) and i ruled out other possible causes such as hormones or deficiencies so if a med brought my neurotransmitters back in balance will i be able to quit it and stay in remission ? if my brain was normal before can't it be normal again without relying on meds ? i'm asking because i want to understand my situation better and i'm afraid that if i stay on meds i might developed tolerance to them.anyone has information or resource on this topic ? i've been looking into mood disorders books but haven't found one that explored this topic

"i do things for years and years on end and still fail miserably every time. <e1>everything i ever try to do always fucking fails</e1> because <e2>i was born with too many fucking disabilities</e2> (such as autism, low muscle tone, hypermobility, a fucked up eye, etc. <e3>i cant do sport</e3> because <e4>i have low muscle tone</e4>, meaning <e5>i have to try harder to do anything</e5>, <e6>i can't play video games</e6> because <e7>my hand eye coordination is the fucking worst</e7>, <e8>i can't write</e8> because <e9>i've got dysgraphia</e9>, i struggle to even do simple things like walk, have conversations, etc. . i struggle to beleve in a god because if he truly is all loving, why haven't i been given the sweet release of death yetbasically, in shorter terms - <e10>i'm sad</e10> because <e11>my disabled ass can't do simple things"</e11>

lol the hospital is trying to set up a payment plan for my trip to the er back in february for a mental health evaluation when i felt i was ready to off myself. <e1>i'm glad i wasn't admitted</e1> because <e2>i can't even pay for my current bill right now</e2>. it's bullshit that we're forced to live and if we don't want to then we're locked away and then have to pay for it too

"ive always wanted a family but i cant punish anyone by being with me. i wish i was genuinely another person, someone who could smile , liked kittens , who is genuinely nice. instead of this depressed monster. <e1>ill never be happy</e1> because <e2>i wont ever have a family of my own and thats something ive always wanted</e2>. being positive doesnt change the fact that no one should have to deal with me. it just makes me feel worse when i come back to reality. i hope i die soon so i dont have to keep distracting myself with nonsense that wont ever feel this void ."

"i dont know how ive became such a bitter person but i havent taken a picture of myself in years. in 2017 i at least looked decent but now i look and feel terrible. i avoid social media, my family, and im going to quit my job to avoid having to talk to people who dont even care about what im talking about in the first place(cold calling). if one other person says something rude to me when im just doing my job i think i may literally scream and break down. <e1>if you dont like to be called, please just hang up</e1> because <e2>if you say something rude i will do the same</e2>. i dont know how ive dug myself into this hole but i suspect my job has made my depression 100 times worse. i hate myself so much that i would do anything to change everything about myself."

"i suddenly felt so empty, lonely, and helpless. been thinking about what shouldve been done, what shouldnt have been done. i know i need to be looking forward to the future and focusing in the present. but just couldnt help but crying.we all know the theories of positivity, but i found it really uneasy in practical. stay positive isnt that simple after all.does anyone ever have this experience?"

"im meeting my newly girlfriend for a movie date in my car. recently shes been very low and i wanted to ask other than a blanket, drink/snacks, what else can i bring that will make her enjoy the moment etc. just want her to feel good lol"

"everyone tells you to talk to someone. apparently itll make things better. well i have. multiple times. im not one to ask for help and its almost as if every time i do reach out, im reminded exactly why i dont. comforting someone is not listing out a bunch of generic solutions like go for a walk or put some make up on , if i had the energy to do those things dont you think i wouldve already? the worst part about being depressed is <e1>people acting like its a mood that will just fade away</e1>. its the <e2>lack of attempt to understand</e2>. i get told youre not the only one whos having a hard time. dont you think i know that? i know that there are people out there struggling and i feel useless for being this depressed lump giving nothing back to society. i hate myself."

"here's how it goes, you feel pumped up, you feel great deep down inside, you hope everything goes well, you like the person you are with, but <e1>for some reason</e1> <e2>you are always mopey</e2>, for no reason whatsoever either. you think each day you will be happy and able to take it on strongly like everyone else, but alas you complain and whine and fight all the time."

"learn from my mistake. it's been about three and a half years since my ex ran off out of the blue. she was my best friend. the problem that lies in that though, is that <e1>when they leave, it on takes forever to get over</e1> because <e2>you no longer have a best friend to talk about your feelings to</e2>.with that best friend role empty for so long, i still find myself fantasizing about her coming back. how would i react? what would i say? playing through all the different scenarios that may go down except the most likely one: that she just won't come back.without that best friend, <e3>you keep everything to yourself, no matter how painful</e3> because <e4>there is no confidant</e4>. and then <e5>when you finally think you've made a new friend, it all comes pouring out</e5> because <e6>you need to tell someone</e6>. then <e7>that person leaves too</e7>, because <e8>you've burdened them to much</e8>. or, <e9>you leave</e9> because <e10>you feel you will overburden them with your emotions</e10>.you end up by yourself, having flashbacks to the times when you were happy with your so. don't make my mistake. please."

"i find myself sitting outside watching the world move and wonder do i even matter, why am i hear and was i made to suffer. <e1>i have bad anxiety and anger that i tend to bottle up</e1> because <e2>no care about an angry black man</e2>. <e3>i hate my job and i struggle with trying to find a new one</e3> because <e4>i just dont know how to get paid to do what i truly love to do in life</e4>. all of that is neither here nor there <e5>i made this post</e5> because <e6>i wonder the most effective way to kill yourself and not feel it</e6> or if i have to feel it lets make it quick. im truly tired of living and i think so is everyone else i suck up a lot of resources im a waste of space, air and life i wish i could just donate all my organs so that in my death i actually did something note worthy. i battle depression everyday and these are just a few of my thoughts rushing through my mind today. i just hope one day i can truly be happy."

"as the title says, my depression has been getting somewhat better these days. i can at least do stuff and dont feel like killing myself these days. but the thing that scares me most is the depression relapsing. whenever ive been enjoying my life, depression sneaks in and suddenly, it makes everything bland again. even if i calm down, i dont feel as much joy in doing those activities anymoreif anyone has any advice, id really like it. i feel as if im on the verge of conquering depression and i dont want to fall back into that hellhole again"

i am so hard on myself and i cant think of one good thing to say about myself and i pretend all day to be confident but im really just always comparing myself to others. <e1>i never feel good enough</e1> and <e2>i feel like i cant do anything i want to give up</e2> just bc <e3>my expectations are too high</e3> and <e4>i know i will never meet themi go to therapy</e4> but i feel like half the time i just say what i think my therapist wants to heari think ive been depressed since high school i feel like the last time i was truly happy was middle school (im 23 now)i feel like push away people close to me but i feel so insecure in friendships/relationships and think about something i said/ someone said and how that made them feel and if they like me. and i often self sabotoge by starting fights and ending relationships so i dont need to wonder if they like me anymore i already know my answer.

"we talked about philosophy, history, religion, and politics. we disagree here and there-but thats alright, we always have. it was fun. a good discussion, a good debate-i felt present.then - mid conversation, my mom starts to cry. im confused and back track, thinking that i must have said something to upset her. she surprises me with youre so smart, do you know that? truly intelligent. im paying you a compliment -please just take it.the why do you waste it? didnt need to be said."

"i keep trying to explain how hard it is for me to concentrate, focus and do most things. even just following and listening to someone who is talking directly to me is challenging at times. <e1>now my psych wants me to go see an occupational therapist for some remedial crap</e1>. <e2>it makes me so fucking angry</e2> - like somehow its my fault and its something im doing wrong, like im not trying hard enough.i just burst into tears and said that <e3>if thats the case and i then i dont see the point of living anymore</e3> because <e4>doing anything is just exhausting</e4>.im just exhausted of being alive, constantly trying to keep my head above water and not fall apart and be a burden to my family or society."

i bought a quest 2 and overall i love it. and a lot of things can be done from a sitting position. <e1>i do stand for short burst</e1>. but <e2>i mainly have to sit</e2>.<e3>i got a first person shooter game (contractors) and like you have to be standing</e3> because <e4>you have to reach down and grab your gun and clips and grenades and knife off of your body in order to use themjust a bummer</e4>. i am trying to work on it. but <e5>with heart issues and other health issues</e5>. <e6>it is hard to move in certain ways or even for very long</e6>.not to mention the carpal tunnel and arthritis.i love the supernatural and fitness vr apps but they are so expensive $100-$200 a year.beat saber helps me be a bit more active at least. and i can sit down at times.when anthony from ltt did his home upgrade one of the things was setting up vr in a better way so he could be more active. <e7>seemed like a good idea</e7> so <e8>i thought i would try it</e8>.
