still exhausted and stressed as always. nothing's changed and apparently i'm not depressed enough to warrant pills. doctor's a bitch.fuck this.

"good evening all. today after doing some grocery shopping with some family we decided to stop at this little store that we thought looked interesting. as we are looking around at the things they are selling mind you i was still in the deep dark area of my mind and unable to get out of it, i heard it. the most beautiful chime i've ever heard in my entire life. it was so beautiful i froze in my tracks. it was a grandfather clock in the corner of the store chiming at the top of the hour. <e1>as i listened to this for a brief 30 seconds</e1> <e2>all sadness left me</e2>, it was a moment of pure bliss in my mind. i'm not sure what came over me but i'm glad it happened. i almost bought it on the spot but sadly it was 2900.00$. but i think one day in the future i'm going to go back and get that clock.tl;dr i was sad and a grandfather clock gave me a moment of happiness for the day."

"i'm in online school and every time i have work to do i end up sitting there staring at the screen getting nothing done. my grades are at a new time low and i have barely a month to get them back up before i'm held back. my parents took away my laptop and the consoles 5 months ago and i still have no motivation despite me being constantly desperate to get them back. whenever i'm in classes and doing homework i feel like crying, throwing something, and vomiting at the same time. this stupid loop i'm in is driving me insane and making me feel like a fucking retard. even in classes that i genuinely enjoy, i end up just going to my room and listening to music under my blankets."

"today is hard to get through. a lot of bad thoughts. i realized that actually working makes me happy. however thanks to <e1>covid</e1>, <e2>i spent over a year now just on my computer</e2>. people who make the decision to take away people's freedom to save old people don't seem to see how they're killing people who could have had a decent life.<e3>i felt so happy</e3> when <e4>i was able to work at college last week</e4>. now i feel so bad."

"i've been taking extra folic acid, up to around 2mg. <e1>noticed semen quality seemed better. but then got depressed, angry and down</e1> which resulted in me <e2>drinking beers to relax last night</e2>. would that be due to the folic acid?"

i honestly just want an escape from this life. nothing is working out for me. im 23m im working 2 jobs but im still weighed down by student loans every month. <e1>my girlfriend of 3 and a half years just left me</e1> cause <e2>she didnt feel the same anymore</e2>. i have no real passions in life and the medicine i was prescribed doesnt help anymore. i keep hearing it will get better but how? i can barely get up in the morning. all i can really think about is killing myself but <e3>i wouldnt want to break my moms heart</e3> so <e4>i cant even do that</e4>. and on my off days all i do is lay in bed and scroll on my phone for hours.  i feel like im going no where in life and i have nothing. im sure people have it 100x worse then me but i just wanted to get my feelings out there.

"hello everyone, my name is mahmoud makke and i'm from venezuela. i am 28 years old and i play the flute, i am musician. <e1>after after going through depression due to my break up with my ex gf</e1> i finnally <e2>could start working to reach my dreams</e2>. i've got accepted to study music in the conservatoire  rayonnement rgional perpignan mditerrane montserrat caball in the city of perpignan, france. <e3>i am so excited</e3> because <e4>my dreams is to study in france</e4> and i'm so close to make it come true. but <e5>i need help</e5>, due to <e6>the crisis that my country lives in</e6> <e7>i have to ask for help</e7> so <e8>i can sustain myself while i get a job in france</e8>. the money raised will be used to cover the expenses of my stay until i get a job and achieve the necessary economic stability to continue my studies without inconveniences. you will find more details in the link below in the first comment. i can share with anyone who wants by email the proves that i am actually accepted in the conservatory. thanks a lot and sorry for my bad english"

"i don't know if i really am getting stupid or if it's just the depression getting to me, but there are simple tasks at work and outside work (for example bureaucratic tasks) that <e1>make me feel totally stupid</e1> because <e2>the more i try to do them</e2>, <e3>the more frustrated i get</e3> because <e4>i'm not getting the results i want</e4>. and in the end i am just ready to start crying as on one side, <e5>i cannot allow myself to let it go</e5>, because <e6>then i would be a failure</e6>, and <e7>on the other side i don't see myself continuing</e7>, as i'm just failing.is it just the depression? <e8>i can honestly not tell</e8> because <e9>i think it's been more than a year</e9> now that i am suffering from it and not sure if the two things are connected."

"good evening everyone ,since wendsday may 5 i reduce paroxetine dose of 20mg daily and diazepam 5mg in the morning and 5mg in the evening to 20mg paroxetine every other day and 5mg of diazepam in the evening .is it normal to me to <e1>feel a very heavy chest tightness and shortness of breath</e1> ? because <e2>im afraid right now</e2> . thanks everyone for yours answers ."

"my therapist told me he couldnt help me but keep trying. its almost funny how hard it is to get help when everyone says go to therapy as if its a magical cure. finding a therapist is hard and challenging. the hope is worse than living with depression, at least i dont have to sink lower when it all fails.he couldnt remember what i said and just forced cliche lines on me. <e1>i read self help books</e1> already so <e2>i know the basic tricks</e2>. i feel like im paying someone to tell me well did you restart your computer  when i have a virus . can you imagine if we just told people dying of covid to just take some tylenol.i explained to my therapist that people leave if i dont act happy sometimes and he did the same after i stopped acting hopeful around him. <e3>he didnt even realize this was happening</e3> because <e4>he was too busy protecting his ego</e4>. how can i get help if even my therapist cant handle me being myself."

"in the past few months i have seen some great improvements with my mental health, to the point where my therapist and i felt ready to end our sessions. not really anything has changed since then, but over the past couple of weeks i've noticed that i've been feeling a bit more down and withdrawn.what's really stuck out to me is that my internal monologue has gotten a lot more critical and mean spirited, which is usually the first sign of trouble for me.i'm also finding that i'm getting self harm urges, which i haven't acted on but they just sort of cling to my mind throughout the day. it doesn't feel critical, but a part of me is concerned that it could of i don't try to nip it in the bud soon.should i be concerned? am i reading too much into this? i'm wondering if i should talk to my psychiatrist about this, or get back in contact with the therapist. what do you think?"

"don't you just love it when you go into a depressive ep during final exams week... i'm so angry at myself. even doing something so simple takes so much of my energy, and it sucks a lot as a junior student... i hate myself for being like this but i just can't seem to do anything.i know i should be studying but i can't. everything is so hard. i wish i didn't have this fucking mental illness please stop destroying my life i beg.. leave me alone ..please"

i was so good i was doing so good i was doing so so so so good but it always comes back to this i'll never escape it its just one little bad thing that will tear me down and rip me apart and i cant handle it i hate online classes i hate tuition i hate my fucking professor i hate the fact that i impulsively took a bad decision and i hate  the degree im studying to the point where i wish i could say fuck it and run to do something that i really like but everythings so expensive

"so, today <e1>my mother told me to stop being depressed</e1> because <e2>if i continue being like that, i will end up like my aunt (she has chronic depression too) whose face has become swollen from the medication</e2>.also, i do not diagnose myself, i am 21 years old, i used to go to a psychiatrist for years and i also used to take antidepressants (prozac / ladose) but the therapy didn't help me at all and neither did the medication, so i guess i can't just stop being depressed mom"

"i've been bad but i don't know if it's ever been this bad. sounds physically hurt me. <e1>i nearly lost my mind</e1> because <e2>my dog was lapping water, the sound was like shards of glass in my brain</e2>. any interaction with anybody is an exercise of willpower and i am agitated beyond belief by them being anywhere near me. i can't seem to find help. i live in a third world country where any kind of mental help is either terrifying or costs too much. no one answers the depression hotlines. the police drive me to their headquarters and let me sit there until i ask them to take me home. they promised victim's counselling for a domestic situation i am in but there was no such person. i've screamed at my mother to get away from me. i drive her away if she comes close. i hate that she can't help me. i hate feeling guilty about it. yet i keep reaching out for help. i'm not sure what i'm looking for. i'm in crisis. i can't cope. i'm sinking fast. does somebody know what to do?"

"im a fucking loser. no legit job, no great education, horrible grades due to depression, no friends, got dumped. everyone has left me or screwed me over the past month and ive only been feeling worse and worse. <e1>im so lonely</e1> and <e2>i have no one to vent to about everything thats happened</e2> because <e3>my support system is gone</e3>. i have nothing going for me and i deserve everything bad thats come to me too so i cant be that upset, but im at a loss of what to do. i feel very very hopeless and alone and lay in bed all day but dont sleep at night until i sob myself to sleep. i fucking hate my life but it just seems like it gets worse so i should get used to it."

"i am from brazil, thatas bad enough on its own, all my friends from college left the country and are leaving the dream on europe and whatnot, i didn't even finished college, money is barely enough to feed yet i expend money on games like it will the void of my life, gonna die for sure so might as well have some fun while i still cana feel somethingsorry for the rambling i wish i could do something about life but i'm afraid it's to late, i am 30 years old, have a shitty job at some school changing babies diapers, eh that what i have thanks for reading if you are still here have a good rest of your day sorry"

"what if i tried killing myself and ended up being found unconscious by someone in my family and <e1>they all are so surprised i would do such a thing</e1> cause <e2>to them everytime they see me im always just laughing</e2> and <e3>im not saying much</e3> and <e4>whatever i do say is not sad or depressing, im always cracking jokes or pretending to not be lost in myself</e4>. im in my room practically for 90% of my day everyday, rarely out of it. its weird how not even my own family really really really knows me. its very isolating. only people that know every part of me is myself, my mom knows more than anyone else, but theres stuff even she doesnt know. people know im depressed and suffer from anxiety, they know how damaged i am but no one knows the thoughts i have at night... every day. it sucks."

"right now, <e1>i feel kinda proud of myself</e1> because <e2>i cut (mowed) the grass earlier today</e2>. i know it isnt much, but its the most productive ive been in a long time. <e3>i just thought id share this</e3> since <e4>i have seen similar posts from people sharing their experiences and achievements</e4>, even though mines shouldnt really be classed as an achievement. but im happy i did it and it makes the outside of our house look better."

"i don't want to talk to anyone else but her. i know she would know what to do. i've been so lost for years, and she made everything feel alright for once. but i was confused, about myself, about who i am, why i am the way that i am. why i'm so fucking sad all the time, why i literally hate everything. why i self sabotaged myself into a depressive episode that's going on a month now. fuck this. i want to be better. but the one thought that comes to mind is ""what's the point if no one is going to come back?"""

i feel so lonely and depressed and ive tried everything the only thing that works is being in a relationship i love having someone i can call mine i love spending hours with someone and it feels like minutes i hate being single so much <e1>i just want a girlfriend wholl stay with me and not leave me</e1> because <e2>i can be a bit overwhelming</e2> sometimes <e3>i only get like that</e3> because <e4>i trust you and feel like i can tell you anything</e4>

"i feel i have been depressed since birth.  ever since i can remember, there was this melancholy in me that i couldn't explain or even understand at first.i kept thinking that it will go away but it just keeps getting worse.  now i'm almost 30 and my life hasn't worked out well.  i look ugly,  i'm stupid and <e1>i do a dead end job</e1> after <e2>losing all my money in the stock market</e2>.  i have no social skills.  <e3>ive cut off from all my friends</e3> as <e4>they have become more successful and gone their own ways</e4>.i have failed at everything i have ever tried.  music,  sports,  law,  and now the stock market.  i have let donw my parents and i have let down my self.  i just want to end my life in my sleep in that's possible.  if someone can help me out with this id be grateful."

"sometimes i feel like the only way someone will want me is through a hookup. ive always been afraid of them, but <e1>tonights the nightexcept im on my period and it came 18 days early</e1>. <e2>ill stay home</e2>."

so im 18 and live in the uk <e1>my mum is kicking me out the house</e1> because <e2>she wants to live with her boyfriend</e2> and <e3>we dont get along</e3> as <e4>hes mean to me and wont move in unless i leave</e4>. sadly my mum cares more about her boyfriend and is saying i need to leave. it really hurts me that shes choosing him over me. problem is i have no where to live so i dont know what to do. she wants me to move to another country to live with my auntie but im a student in sixth form and im not moving to a different country. she also suggested i rent a flat but i earn minimum wage and only work part time as i have school plus theres no way i can afford a flat i dont turn 19 for almost a year. i dont know what i can do i dont know my dad and dont have friends to stay with

"<e1>i feel like a kid being forced to watch other kids have fun and play while you sit there</e1> because <e2>you have to be on a wheelchair</e2>. <e3>you smile physically at them while they're enjoying themselves but frown mentally</e3> as <e4>something is blocking you from enjoying yourself</e4>. basically a sad smile in a way.i don't know if anyone else feels like this, but i've been feeling like this for quite a long time. and it sucks. i'm sorry to anyone that's going through something like this."

"i currently have only one friend (not a close one).. i've always struggled to make friends with anybody, due to lots of reasons.. my life is literally made of problems, which i can't deal with.. and i'm a problem myself too.. i've never been on holidays with my peers, which seems to be very common for people my age (i'm 19) .. my problems are such a big obstacle to me that <e1>i basically can't get to know any new people</e1>, as <e2>i'm too stressed out about my problems</e2>. they don't allow me to live normally! <e3>i lost all my hobbies</e3> as <e4>the only thing i do is to try to solve all my problems</e4>.. <e5>people don't want to talk to me</e5> as <e6>i can only talk about how miserable i am</e6> and i understand them.. but it's not my fault either that so many bad things happened in my life.. i guess i don't deserve so much suffering and i don't see the end of my life problems (new ones keep emerging all the time)"

"im 17 so i know everyone's gonna tell me shit like ""you have the world ahead of youuu and blah blah blah but like ... i highly doubt this shit gets any better and i'm willing to bet my life on it lol. <e1>its been a rough couple of years</e1> and so <e2>i told myself that i'm gonna dorm at college and do coke and have a great time</e2>, but now i'm forced to commute stuck in my shoebox room with my parents and they asked me something along the lines of "" what happens if you wrack up all this debt and then start flunking"" and my first thought was absolutely kill myself, like i'm almost sure this is the way to go. i have no idea why i'm posting this but if only i told my young little happy self a couple years ago that it was gonna get this bad, she would have enjoyed her time more."

"i've relapsed. i'm sh-ing again, drinking, not left my bed since monday... the usual hopeless, worthless, suicidal etc. i know i should get help. i'm just terrified of making the phone call to get an appointment. maybe i'm faking it. maybe i'll be fine tomorrow. what should i do?"

"i am a 24m and <e1>my life sucks</e1>. why? <e2>i am friendless after graduating high school from 2015</e2>. another reason why it sucks is that <e3>i work at a bad job</e3> (steward/dishwasher supervisor) that i don't want to stay in but have to stay just to keep my benefits and financial money flow afloat, social anxiety, no drivers license, graduated with an associate's degree in computer engineering but cannot land me a decent paying job because i lack relative experience, and <e4>sexually frustrated</e4> because <e5>i never had a girlfriend</e5>. i know that being in the 20s is too young, but i don't want to be that clich ""fat and lonely depressed man"" that's depicted in today's societal culture. adulthood is such a pain in the ass, but the only good thing that came out of is that i am raised and still live with loving parents. and i have no freaking idea what's going on man.."

"i was hanging out with a friend today and we went and biked to an abandoned property with a house and 2 barns. low and behold, what do i find? a minibike sitting in pieces  in boxes. i'm debating about going back and getting it, stuff like that is the only thing keeping me alive right now, i bought a motorcycle to rebuild it to give me something to do other than be depressed as shit all the time. what does everyone else think? should i take it and rebuild it? (the barns and house should be being demolished soon)"

"instagram is <e1>somehow special</e1> because <e2>the concentration of positivity and happiness in the content on there is just so high</e2>. when i look at people dancing or puppies set to happy music or whatever, there's this wall of absolute revulsion and rejection that comes up within me, and i can't get past it into the blissful feeling that the stuff should elicit. it's like a desire for the thing but also a strong rejection of it at once. also <e3>a fear of allowing myself to feel this way</e3>, it would just <e4>make me so unbearably vulnerable to do that</e4>.it also feels like these people are mocking me with the almost parody level of happiness they are throwing at me. ""*happy happy happy* oh what's the matter honey? you not feeling so good?""how are all these people able to just be so comfortable with themselves? what have they done to deserve that?then i look at myself in my phone's camera and hate myself for the piece of shit that i am with the sour expression on my face."

"i feel like i'm standing at the edge of a river and if i stay at the edge, i will wither and die. the only way to survive is the river. but if i jump into the river, it won't be long before my naked body is eviscerated by the rocks and the current, and i will drown (not before experiencing horrible pain). i see all these people floating down in rafts, protected from the horror of the water underneath. no doubt some wouldn't mind wacking me with their paddles as they go by."

i havent been genuinely happy in well over a year now. i mean there have been times where i have experienced happiness but it only last for seconds then im back being in my shot hole of a brain. does anyone know how i can make myself happy.

"i feel like when everything is okay it's great but lately i'm back to one issue after another. it seems like when my relationship is okay the rest of my life is fine. i want to go to therapy but i'm very tired of people saying ""you don't need it"" or my parents asking if it's because of them. today, after a short message, followed by a fight from my significant other of 6 years, i'm afraid i'm on a decline again."

"i started using dating apps and it seems like all these girls have infinitely more interesting lives than i do. it doesn't matter if the dogma on the internet is that they're posting their highlights and not their lows, i couldn't come up with anything highlights to post at all.i spent the last 10 years failing in school, humiliating myself publicly, taking care of my grandmother and babysitting my sister's kids. in the end, i walked away with nothing.i am 26, i have not found a career path for myself or held down a job, i have not left the country or seen the ocean, i have not learned the languages i wanted to learn, i have not been in a healthy relationship, and i have never been out with friends.i still have not moved out or achieved 10% of the goals i had set out for myself. i feel like a failure compared to others. i have gained weight over the past month, i have struggled with parts of my appearance all my life.above all, the one thing i have noticed this past month is that i have not had many experiences since i left high school. in my head, i am still there, in those hallways, surrounded by people whom i did not fit in with, feeling disgusting in my body. i have anxiety when i am criticized, i assume people are as cruel and nasty as they were when i was younger.no one else is quite like me. i am without doubt inferior to others my age. i don't like myself"

"my day became somewhat off for some reason as it went on and eventually as night came i became upset and depressed. i played about 5 rounds of the sorry board game with my wife and most of the time i didnt care if i won or lose as long as the game ended (i went out of my way to make sure the game didnt get extended in anyway). afterwards i tried to play computer games but i was becoming bored or upset. finally i started looking at random stuff and eventually i ended up looking at porn.i <e1>hate pornography</e1> because i <e2>know it acts like a working substitute for prozac/xanax considering</e2> that the two actually do not work for me. ive been <e3>trying to kill the habit</e3> but because i <e4>feel like i am constantly stressed, depressed, or upset it refuses to die</e4>. whats messed up is i start having anxiety issues right up until im able to do confessions (im catholic). so it basically is <e5>a double-edge sword.i get so angry and upset with myself</e5> because <e6>it doesnt stop and it scares me when i start thinking that ill have to deal with this the rest of my life</e6>. that ends up making me depressed and then the cycle begins anew."

"<e1>i dropped out of high school in the 10th grade</e1> due to <e2>social anxiety</e2> and became a hermit. the depression and general anxiety started when i was 19, and has continued without relief. the first few years were incredibly painful, but i was still me. now i'm just an empty human with the memories of someone i used to be.the constant brain fog has made me lose confidence in everything i say. i used to be assertive and funny. now i'm sensitive and can't think clearly enough to say something witty. even my voice has become lighter and weaker.i always told myself i'd manage to teach myself a skill online and find a way out of this, but i failed every time i tried. i didn't have the willpower to stick with anything for more than a week. now my mental state is so bad that when i <e3>try to put effort into learning anything i become overwhelmed with feelings of failure</e3>, which causes me to <e4>spiral into a darker place</e4>.i've mostly given up on telling my family about how i feel. being a financial burden on them is one thing, but i don't want to be an emotional one too. i'd try to get on medication and see a therapist, but i no longer have insurance.can anyone relate? i have very little hope for the future, but seeing others that are dealing with similar problems brings me a little bit of the comfort of not being alone."

next year i'm supposed to be going to university but it's extremely expensive + my family is in a tough spot financially and i really <e1>don't want to be a burden to them</e1>. also because of that reason <e2>i can't go to therapy</e2> because <e3>we can't afford it</e3>.my parents are always fighting and <e4>it stresses me out so fucking much</e4> because <e5>not only do i have to help two grown adults make up (or at least stop screaming at each other) but i also have to comfort my younger siblings</e5>.and to top it all off since <e6>this is my final year of highschool i'll have to take my final test in about a month</e6> but i'm getting so overwhelmed that i'm skipping school weeks at a time.i can't take it anymore i just want to rest.

"is there a psycological reason as to why i cry and get sad when looking at childhood pictures/videos? i had a happy childhood and am now seemingly happy graduating college, but whenever i see a photo i get emotional."

"i've been trying to put myself back out there since restrictions have been lifted some. but still nothing. last saturday night my kids were at my ex mother in law's house and i ventured to a local bar. the only guys that hit on me were really not my type at all. the only one that is give the time of day to, were after skinny younger girls. i tried talking to one but i could tell <e1>he wasn't interested</e1> after i explained about my sexuality. fml. so <e2>i finished my malibu and pineapple and went home</e2>. i put on my comfy pajamas and binged watched season 3 of outlander for the 50th time. i downloaded a dating app...no luck there. i'm beginning to feel depressed and lost again. <e3>are you out there</e3>? because <e4>i'm here waiting</e4>..."

"<e1>i have to force myself out of bed each morning, on the days where i even can get out of bed</e1>, just so <e2>i can go to work</e2>. at work i use up all of my energy masking and pretending to be happy and normal. a busy little worker bee, full of sunshine. i always check the clock, as if i can force the time to go faster. i just want to be home, i just want to be home, i just want to be home. then finally, i am. and its such a relief to not have to be happy, happy, happy and to just sit. and i sit and i stare at the wall, maybe stare at my phone or a game or a movie. and then its over and its time to go to bed. and it all starts over again.  my bones ache. if i could just rest enough, i think, i could go do all the things i want to do. but i never can get enough, it seems. its never ending."

"its just hard to wake up everyday and do the things you need to do; everything seems so hopeless. i feel like i have a lonely, hard future; my sexuality and gender put me in danger and i have to pretend to be someone who i am not, i <e1>can't deal with the hopelessness and absolute grief i get from how shitty life is just</e1> because some people <e2>don't want to be responsible and yet take positions in work/government and don't do their job</e2>.but i feel responsible to ""offset"" their effect, i feel like i have to do good in my studying to make life better but i just can't, it's hard to even get out of bed. i haven't been even acting good to my best friend; i text her to just feel the only humanity that i feel around me yet chicken out when she responds.i'm just tired and don't know what to do; the future seems hard and the present just fills me with grief, it's not fair and i want to work to make it fair but i cant because i'm tired. i want to get out of the cycle but getting therapy has alot of hoops tied to it and i don't even know anymore. i'm tired and mad and sad and just sick of it, i don't know what to do."

im a 15 year old boy and i <e1>feel lost</e1>. this year was supposed to be my start of high school but <e2>nothing has gone right</e2>. at the start of the year <e3>my girlfriend of 13th months dumped me and the little friends i had left kinda just stopped talking to me</e3>. i feel utterly hopeless and 3 months ago i started having a lot of suicidal thoughts.i just want friends. i want someone. fuck me

"i have been putting off journaling. i dont want to see the thoughts. ive had a rough few years i think (feel free to look at post hx.) i have never woken up this many days in a row and thought, but why ? why even try? i go an avg of 4 days without showering. i attempt to workout but its like im manic at one point and then im low again beating myself up. i have <e1>never felt this way where i wont even have the urge to get to work when i know in my heart that i just landed the big girl job that i have worked my ass off for</e1>. <e2>because i feel like a joke</e2>. ive never called off so many days in the last 15 years than i have this year. i dont understand."

i <e1>can't even enjoy my free time anymore</e1>. <e2>nothing sounds enjoyable and i feel like i'm bad at everything i do</e2>. youtube and reddit are so mindless it's the only thing i do anymore. everything else has just not been fun for me anymore. all the games i play are getting kinda old or i suck at them and it just isn't fun to play anymore. i play disc golf sometimes but i'm just so bad it's not worth it. like nothing is enjoyable in life anymore. oh and don't even mention trying to be creative. yeah that's not gonna happen. i'm just so fucking miserable and bored and lonely. i have a solo trip i've been planning next week and i'm just not even that excited about it. thankfully i have an appointment with a psychiatrist soon. maybe i'll get antidepressants and i'll actually find things enjoyable again.

"so, i'm still here. i'm surprised, being honest. i just survived a mental breakdown that i thought was really the end of me, in a personal sense and a literal one. but no, as crap as i felt today, i began to snap out of my funk. maybe all the thrashing got it out of my system, not sure what else it could be.i'm about to get to bed once again, but i just needed to talk briefly. i'm sick of constantly feeling this low and sitting around waiting for the problems to fix themselves, or just waiting for myself to die so i don't even need to face them. i <e1>realised how little help i've really received</e1>, due to <e2>my inability to actually seek out psychiatric help</e2>. it's a small start, but i began opening up to people about that desire. help from college <e3>can only do so much</e3>, <e4>they're teachers and assistants; their forte is education, not mental health</e4>.i don't know how long this thought process will last though, which scares me. now that i've gotten a taste of this desire to improve, i don't want to slip back nto laziness and selfishness. but for now, at least i do have a desire to improve. won't be easy, but i have to try. just hoping that i will.goodnight, you all. hope your sleeps will provide you a little respite."

"hello, i was prescribed sertraline 50 mg to help me cope with a moderate depression diagnosis.i've always had a high functioning depression, and coped with it just fine with exercise and alternative ways; but with the pandemic and all i stopped being functional.my goal is just to take it until this specific crisis is over, get my life back on track, and wean off it. i don't want to take this drug my whole life, or relapse when my serotonin crashes after i stop taking it.has anybody been able to actually come off it after using it just once and never came back to it?i just want to feel in control of myself as much as i can, and i just need a little help for a bit. are all the withdrawal and worsened depression symptoms for a year afterwards worth it for just an isolated depression episode? thanks, i'm having a lot of doubts and fears about this drug crippling my own sense of independence i had built for years to come."

"i <e1>never saw myself as being depressed</e1>. i know i <e2>get anxious but depression has always seemed situational to me. like bad things happen but they always get better</e2>, right? but what happens when they don't?this feeling isn't going away for me. i'm in financial ruin with no way out. my relationships are falling apart. what do you guys look to to get you through? i have nothing."

"i'm constantly look forward, never happy with myself or what i've done. none of my relationships or activities are hitting that impossibly high standard. i constantly beat myself up and have no self-esteem."

"i'm 21 and i've been depressed since the age of 16, <e1>constant suicidal thoughts, regular panic attacks and the overall feeling of melancholy</e1>. i <e2>had to drop out of school...and leave my job</e2>. tried so many psychologists and therapists but i never felt like they understood me. the sessions never lasted for any longer than 3, and after that, i'd pretty much lost all hope, planning my suicide. all things changed though, when last year with the insistence of a friend of mine, i decided to give life a last shot and for the first time ever i went to a psychiatrist and took medication. it's been exactly a year, and i couldn't be more thankful. i look back at all the times where i felt miserable and i viewed it as the only way man can be, but since then i've come to realize that it doesn't have to be that way, that things can be better. i still find myself tired most of the time, i'm still unable to finish my book and have a lot of troubles in my new work place, but for the first time in my life i'm looking forward to the future. i hope anyone who reads this never decides to give up on their life until they've given it all they've got. this is a wonderful life, no matter how relative that ""wonderful"" may be."

"the answer is probably yes but fuck it. i want to hear it from someone else.heres some background. im a small business owner. my girlfriend tells me that i should talk to someone- friends or a therapist/life coach/psychologist... someone.its <e1>hard to talk to most of my friends</e1> because ive been<e2> withdrawn the last several years</e2>... either <e3>being too busy with work, too tired from work, or just not wanting to be socia</e3>l. despite being very much so a people person someone close to me has commented how i hate people now.i looked up how much it would be to talk to a psychologist. with my shitty health insurances $5k deductible, i might as well not have health insurance. i still owe $7k in vet bills from my dog passing last year. i dont need more fucking debt.i dont have suicidal thoughts and dont want to die. however, i have gone through cycles of self hatred. i do feel like i almost never make the right decisions.i have been quick to anger the last couple years. when i get angry, i mono focus on it. i have mock-arguments in my head. i let my anger ruin my day. when i try to focus on something positive, i almost always fall back into negativity.today i found out that my mom has been on antidepressants for the last 6-9months. when im angry, im more like her than my dad in terms of how they act when theyre angry.do i need help? what kind? how do i find it?"

"were all dead anyway. it makes no difference what happens well all be dead and forgotten. im already there, im free. theres no meaning to any of the suffering it just fucking happens. its all meaningless. the sickness is truth. fuck your lies fuck me toofuck everyone what if im not depressed? what if i just have chronic boredom? bored of life? of myself? because <e1>theyre lies</e1>. <e2>none of it matters anymore everyone should die all life is bs and lies so free yourself if you can</e2>. ill free them....haha im joking. i just really dont care anymore im like this bc im too afraid to die. dont suffer, thats all there is and once you realize it theres no point fighting yourself. you just end up suffering. i dont know how long ill be here but i know the only way to end this"
anyone else get super depressed during the holidays even though they have lots of family to be around?

"im (26m) more depressed then ever.  me and my wife opened our marriage about a year ago.  it has been amazing.  to watch her grow and become the confident bad ass bitch she was when we were dating and first married.  how ever no one ever talks to me.  i cant get a young lady to hold a conversation and even guys are the same way, im bi-curious.  just want to feel wanted and attractive to other people.  i havent been this sad, depressed and just meh in almost two years."

"i started taking lexipro two months ago and started waking up drenched in sweat every few days. the past two weeks or so it has been every day--i <e1>have to change all of my clothing sometimes twice every night</e1> because <e2>i am soaked in sweat</e2>. i've never had this issue before- doesn't matter the temperature of the room or the clothes i'm wearing.i see that it's a side effect for antidepressants sometimes but i'm wondering if anyone else has this experience. i already feel so empty and exhausted 24/7, this is making my days even more miserable. have you had this happen to you?"

"i didnt know i had a dentist appointment tomorrow and now my <e1>anxiety</e1> is through the roof. i know its gross but i find it so <e2>difficult to take care of myself, and unfortunately that includes brushing my teeth</e2>. so obviously <e3>the dentist isnt gonna be happy with my plaque and cavities<e/3>.have any of you been in this situation before? did you explain yourself? is it worth it? im crying now thinking about just sitting in shame and i cant stop freaking out."

im constantly battling my brain. im tired of fighting. ive been depressed since i was 8. im tired of nobody caring or wanting or needing me. i feel like my life is just so pointless. i dont know how much longer i can keep existing. i feel like im going to snap. f26

"i am doing all i can to improve myself: exercise, eating better, breathing exercises, going to bed earlier. even looking at a place to escape the rat race and live sustainably.but it hardly matters at the end of the day. i have barely the motivation to do what makes me happy. all i do otherwise is watch tv, look at reddit, and sleep the rest of the time. and even that doesn't help quiet the crippling anxiety (the source none of my control and not something that should even make me stressed). or the voice that makes me wish something awful would happen to me.i don't want to do anything suicidal or have a strong desire to die, but i wish someone would hit me with a car or i get kidnapped or my plane crashes. just anything to no longer think about this life for a long time. if i die, oh well. i know i shouldn't want this, and i have others who would miss me, especially my dog, but the idea of seeing myself in the hospital or struck by a vehicle has my heart race like when i did want to kill myself."

"i(16m) have a brother(13) whos already my height of 57 and projected to be 62. i honestly <e1>cant stand it</e1>. it already <e2>sucks enough to have a 60 tall father, but to have a brother even taller than that is just torture</e2>. the average life of short men already sucks enough, especially with how girls see us, but to be short and have a tall brother and father is just too much. i honestly <e3>cant help but be mad at my mother</e3>, as <e4>she was the one who gave me my short genes</e4>. <e5>shortness isnt a problem for women</e5>, so <e6>it doesnt matter to her</e6>, but she just had to past on the defective trait onto me and ruin my chances of sexiness. my only options are to get limb lengthening surgery or move away to distance myself from my tall superior family members. both are painful and shitty options. the former seems to be the best path. i just cant take living as a short guy anymore.also, my doctor said im basically done growing."

"this is what's most shitty about depression, whatever it feels like is bringing you down is just your head making up reasons for your feelings when it really just wants to make you feel like shit and screw you over.i <e1>thought i was depressed</e1> because <e2>i was lonely</e2>, so <e3>i got a lot of friends</e3> - no change. i thought i continued to be depressed because i was unskilled with a low education, so i got a nice education - no change. i was depressed about the work market and having to sift through shit jobs until finding the right one, and i was lucky enough to land the dream job right out of school - no change.it just continues to fuck me over recursively and now my brain is making up some weird abstract reason, like ""you're gonna be stuck being a wageslave at the same job for 30 years without leading an interesting life, probably"" and now that's making me depressed. it's just a fucking joke, why the hell is our own brains so hellbent on making us miserable.i've done everything to fix my life, and nothing has changed."

"hello, first sorry if this isnt the right place to post. ive been on my meds for years now and they work well. im running low and dont have insurance. and usually i pay out of pocket for my meds but im at the point where i need my prescription to be renewed (think thats the right term). i have no refills left is what im saying. so i was thinking of going to a doctor and paying out of pocket to have them write me a new rx. but i saw on google that you can use sites like brightside or getcrebral and youre matched with a doctor and can get an rx.but this feels very strange. you never meet them. you check in with them... has anyone used these services? how did it go? its not as concerning as it might be if i was new to the game and it was my first time trying to get help and medicine. im concerned ill sign up and they wont prescribe me what i need or it will just be a bad experience.any insight would be much appreciated.i also <e1>would like to say some encouraging words to this community but i know when youre in the bottom, well meaning words sound ridiculous at best and insulting or offensive at worst</e1>. so <e2>ill say your journey is valid</e2>. your struggle is real. i hope you can feel better.thank you."

"i'm 15 years old, i live in england and recently i was <e1>feeling really down with myself</e1>. i am <e2>in year 11 (final year of high-school before going to college) and all my grades are really bad, a pass is a grade 4 but i've been getting grades 1 & 2</e2>. i've got <e3>no friends and the people that i sit next to in my class always make fun of me for not understanding the work or for not getting a question correct</e3>.one day i got bullied soo much, i came home crying, went to my room with a knife, held the knife to my own head and was thinking about ending my life. that's until my mum came bursting into my room because she could hear me crying, she comforted me and made me feel like i belong in this world and that everything would get better.since then, the bullies have got permanently excluded (expelled). i left the school and moved to london with my family. i've settled in to a good school, and amazing friends. i am now living a happy life. my grades in school are still really low, but i'm working extra hard to get them up.this was my experience with depression and bullying. and if you're also a young kid going through depression, just know that things will always get better and that god has a plan for you. speak to someone, call child line, do something that motivates you??. thank you for reading ??"

"for the last 2 years i haven't gone to school and i just ended my senior year and i've failed but i don't really care for the last 2 years i've been in my room only leaving for necessities while sleeping all day and up all night for the last 2 years i've been struggling with my physical and mental health for the last 2 years i've been addicted to multiple drugs over the last 2 years i've lost all my friends and the love of my family i'm getting kicked out at the end of the year if i can't get a job as a education less 16yr old i never have the energy or motivation to even move sometimes and i think i'm getting close to the end just last night i tried to od on painkillers that went well and i think sometime soon i may try again i don't want to harm myself or the people around me but as far as i know everyone's given up on me cause i'm just lazy and a bit down whomever reads this thank you for your time but i don't need anyone to think they need to tell me how much life is worth living say what you want and i will see it, i may even reply have a good day -tiarnan"

"dont be a jerk is a very good rule for a depressed person.i mean think about it, whats the point in living if youre depressed and a jerk? you dont make yourself happy, you dont make anyone else happy, all you are is a vortex of suffering. as a selfish person, youre a failure. as a selfless person, youre a failure.its such a good rule. so why do fail so hard? all i do is disappoint people. let them down. fail them in every way. im a jerk, and im depressed.i suppose the only solution is to buy one of those fancy transoceanic kayaks and set sail for the south pacific. i can <e1>live the rest of my life drinking seawater and eating fish</e1>. and <e2>therell be no one in the world for me to hurt</e2>."

"hi, im 17f and ive never been diagnosed but i do have a lot of depressive symptoms, it feels like ive been stuck in this state for years. partially due to family history of depression, but the biggest factor is my f*cked up family. basically im miserable living with my abusive father. anyways, thats not the point. ive always thought i was just a really lazy piece of shit because i could sleep 15 hours and still sleep on and on... i never get enough sleep. i never wake up with energy. is this a normal symptom of depression?"

"im 28 had depression and anxiety since i was 14. i have cptsd, am an hsp and have attachment trauma which gave me an underlying sense of fear and loneliness. ive tried many medications over my life and nothing has worked for a period long enough that i could be in remission or comfortable enough in life to do normal things like get a job an apartment etc.im currently trying buspirone 15mg with my 200mg of zoloft but i dont think its helping much. obviously things in life are making my mental health harder to manage (covid distancing, everyone being stressed pretty much leaves me with no one to comfort me) but the longer it takes to actually get treatment the more suicidal i start feeling and thats making me feel worse also because <e1>ive been trying and working really hard to work through my shit</e1> (therapy also for like 2-3 years now which has helped in many ways)<e2>my doctor has recommended lithium, atypicals and tms but im afraid of it</e2>. what has helped you or has actually made you feel not so scared and hopeless?ive tried effexor, zoloft, wellbutrin, cipralex, pristique, buspironesorry if im not making sense just feeling defeated and want some uplifting advice"

"i <e1>never speak to my parents anymore</e1>. i <e2>live in the same house as them, stay in my room all day and only ever see them when i come down for food</e2>. every day they ask if im ok and i just say yeah every time and thats it. the last time i made eye contact with them was months ago im such a fucking loser i cant interact with people anymore.i was <e3>so happy and outgoing as a kid</e3>, <e4>theyve been nothing but supportive towards me</e4> and now i treat them like strangers. i told them i was depressed over a year ago but im pretty sure <e5>they think it was just a phase</e5> because <e6>it was my first day back at college</e6> and i was feeling really anxious.they love me but they dont like me. i <e7>really dont want to tell them how i really fee</e7>l because <e8>i hate them seeing me as i am now and not the happy, optimistic kid they once had</e8>. i dont want them worrying about me, they already do/have done so much for me.i <e9>feel ashamed being like this</e9> because <e10>there isnt really a reason</e10>. im so anxious and insecure i dont want anyone seeing me as some depressed kid. i hate drawing attention to myself, id rather be in the background. i just want my parents to be happy. not stressing over helping their socially inept son."

"i've been through years of coping with trauma since i was 13 and ever since then i felt like i lost myself, my own opinions, worth, what i think about stuff and how i truly feel. i feel like all i truly feel is to truly never make anyone i love upset or angry. i live like i'm on eggshells. i <e1>never bring up important stuff that needs to be talked about</e1> because <e2>i feel afraid of what happens afterwards. afraid of hate, afraid of negativity, afraid of it all</e2> because <e3>i know i mentally might not withstand it</e3>. if this happens consistently then i will collapse and spiral eventually to you know what. i always feel like anything i like or want to do may end up causing a problem. and it's not because it hasn't, but because it has. in the end i feel like <e4>a toxic person</e4> because of <e5>my self hatred and self destructive mechanisms</e5>. i really don't want to be. and when i think and reflect really hard about what and who i am, what i think, what i want, or what makes me happy, it always involves a person i love. i'm so codependent if that's the word. it's killing me and my relationship."

"an issue i <e1>struggle greatly with is flat affect</e1>. <e2>i rarely can naturally smile</e2>. i can think something is funny or sweet but it must be hilarious for me to smile or laugh. it is very awkward in social situations where i want to express my solidarity (laugh at a joke, react positively to news, etc) but i cannot naturally do so. i may fake smile but im afraid that i am not very convincing. it makes me feel very disingenuous. ill have a feeling on the inside but it is not easy to show naturally on the outside. is there anything i can do about it? i want to be a smiley person. i didnt always used to be this way."

"since i was 16 i <e1>devoted myself purely to studying for an international competition</e1> for which i did not get the necessary score, i was one place away from qualifying and they beat me by 0.7 points.  i put aside the social life and mentalized that i could get there but it was not like that ... <e2>i lost 4 whole years i did not do things that i should have done at that age i do not have friends now</e2>, i never had a girlfriend for giving myself to that hope of being able to classify and i feel  that i wasted all that time i literally got nothing from those 4 long years in which i lost friends, parties or love relationships, was that worth it?  i should have?  would i be happier if i hadn't hoped to think that it could come?  i do not know but i just know that i have nothing that inspires me to improve or to try. i feel disappointed in myself and i think i hate myself for thinking that i could have achieved that goal and give myself false hope, every day i hope it is the last and i can rest"

"i feel broken, scared, unstable and sad.. the sound of my fridge is the only noise i hear all the time day in and day out, i've come to the self-diagnosis that i have depression. maybe i've always had it and the issues with you and my dad have brought it to its peak. i feel like i'm going crazy, maybe the reason that i <e1>was grumpy all the time</e1> was because i <e2>knew our relationship was on the rocks</e2>, so <e3>my depression grew and grew until it is what it is now</e3>. i'm starting to get thoughts that i never knew i had, voices in the back of my head. the only time i'm truly happy is when i'm asleep and the thought of my continuous sleep seems nice but i'm too scared, i'm scared of death and what comes next. and i don't think i could ever cross that line. all i want is someone to cuddle with and take the pain away, i don't have anyone to do that with come not anymore i just want you back, so that i could just express everything and cry my heart out while you hold me tell me everything is going to be okay and that you love me, even if it's a lie. i don't understand that if there is a god or christ why would he let any of his children my brothers and sisters feel this way at least thoughts and let us be so tormented, unless my soul is so gone it's unsavable"

"(i'm 30 and she is 25)last night, after 5 months of relationship i <e1>let my gf see my darkest side</e1>. <e2>she got pretty scared and worried for our potential future</e2>. <e3>she is also fragile</e3> but not affected by depression. we don't live together. i don't want to push her to stay with me, and her health is way more important for me than mine. even if it means to break up, and she knows it. she understood that from certain perspective i'm really strong mentally but still is worried for a moment when we both gonna have a hard time in the same moment.now i decided and told her that i wont text her until she does it first, and she is free to never do so, i will accept it.should i do or tell her something ?"

"i dont know how people are happy with the way things are in life. i look around myself and keep finding shit wrong with it.i am graduating high school soon, and i didnt even plan on living long enough to see it. i have no direction or purpose in my life anymore. this is all pointless.i can barely keep my room clean, much less be an adult. i want to move out, but i <e1>feel pressured to sta</e1>y due to <e2>financial issues for college</e2>. i feel like theyll use that as leverage.i did not sign up for this, i want no part of it, and i wish i wasnt scared of what could be on the other side waiting for me. if i wasnt, i wouldve done it a long time ago."

"i'm not bullied, i go to a good school,  i have a good amount of great friends, my family is alright, i dont live in poverty, have any massive disabilities (i mean diabetes type 1 but that doesn't cripple me), i have a nice house and good grades. i'm not horrifically obese or very ugly and have never really struggled that much... and yet i still fucking hate myself. i feel hollow, and empty, completely devoid of feeling and i think i make it pretty obvious, unintentionally but still. i hate making people worry and i know i do that a lot so i tend to stfu about my actual feelings in case i make someone think about me every now and again. even still,, i know people do, and i hate that. there is no logic to any of this i just want to lie down and rot.anyway,, mediocre rant over"
how do i feel happy again... lately i just feel heavily depressed... this is my 3rd depression hole i dove in to and this one is just screaming for me to end it all ?

my wife was put on bed rest last year and spent time in the hospital before our daughter was born 12 weeks prematurely. i spent a lot of time at that hospital with my wife and then in the nicu with my daughter. i was with my daughter in the nicu one day when the baby next to us began to crash and her body gave out. the noise of the machines alerting the doctors and nurses the baby was suffering were so loud. the mother's shriek's for the staff to save her child haunt me. when i close my eyes i see the mother pleading for the doctors to save her child and i hear her screams when the machine went quiet and her baby didn't make it. i never told my wife what i witnessed that day and lied to her about why that mother and baby were moved out of the nicu. it has been a few months now and i can't get past this event. it is all i ever think about and see/hear when my mind drifts away. i find myself crying uncontrollably at times when i think about this and wish these memories would go away. i find myself depressed on a level unfamiliar to me and am afraid to discuss with my wife and therapist. i <e1>don't want to admit what i witnessed</e1> as i <e2>don't wish this experience on anyone</e2>. unsure of what to do but wanted to get this off my chest.
i make people upset. maybe if i wasn't around they'd just be happy and not think twice about it. i'm sick of dragging everyone else down.these intrusive thoughts are killing me
does this make any sense does anybody else feel guilty from there depression?

"im a senior in high school and about to graduate next week. every day i hear how well others have their life planned out and it just reminds me how scared i really am. i dont want to go to college but my parents make it seem like its the only thing i can do to be happy what kind of life is that?! go to school just to graduate and make money only to spend the next 20 years paying back student debt? even if i do something good ill just be working to live and living to work. lets say one day i have kids, are they just going to go through the same thing? i know people say that its just life but i dont want to live a life like that if i hate waking up each day more and more. (thanks for reading)"

a bit of a weird question but how can i get depressed again? i just started feeling "better" or "normal" again and i feel like this isn't me. i was much happier or in my comfort zone when i was depressed or when life was shit. any ways to get that feeling back?

"so i have been struggling with what i assume was fatigue for over 2yrs now. when i asked my doctor about it she asked if i was depressed and my response was ""i don't think so?"" i had a sleep study done(mild sleep apnea), thyroid checked(hypo apparently), and i still struggle with fatigue, which i am not sure is even the right word. i just physically struggle to get up in the morning, like my body just doesn't want to move. it <e1>sometimes is a problem</e1> because <e2>i am always rushing to work and sometimes late</e2>. i used to get up in the morning with minimal issues, i have never been a morning person, but now the struggle is real. i used to put makeup on and now brushing hair and teeth is all that gets done. the sleep nurse practitioner told me the reason is ""poor sleep hygiene"" and that i need to go to bed at the same time and wake up at the same time everyday but when i wake up i feel like there is a weight on me.i <e3>currently take lexapro for anxiety and not sure if that has anything to do with it</e3> because <e4>i think it started roughly around the same time</e4>.my question is how did you know it was depression?"

ill start of by saying im not depressed nor have been yet. (im pessimistic and often reckless and self destructive by nature but definitely not depressed) however seeing the struggles of those on this sub i cant help but <e1>feel somewhat helpless</e1> in <e2>my inability</e2> to help. i know from my limited understanding depressions a tricky subject to say the least and that theres no cure. oddly though i <e3>feel its almost a sort of obligation for me to at the very least try to understand your struggles</e3> and thats why ive <e4>come to this sub</e4>. id like to <e5>understand what depression is really like</e5> as i <e6>tend to hear pop culture represention of depression and mental illness in general is very inaccurate</e6>. id also like to <e7>understand should the circumstances come up how to help or at the very least comfort someone struggling with depression/suicidal thoughts</e7> since i <e8>dont what to risk making things worse than they already are</e8>. anyways itll be helpful to know and i wish you all the best of luck (should i even say that?)

"i want to. i wont but i fucking want to.i am worthless. everyone agrees. im a burden. i hurt people. i hurt everyone. god why would i ever want to keep hurting other people?no im <e1>not gonna fucking kill myself</e1>. because <e2>i cant</e2>. because that<e3> would hurt people any more</e3>. but <e4>i pray, i fucking pray for the day that i get struck by lightning, or hit by a bus, or sneak attacked by a bear</e4>, because then <e5>then ill finally be free of my worthless self</e5>.god i just wanna die!!!!!! im an idiot. and a failure. im everything terrible and im only getting worse.you know, lots of people die random deaths every day. i could <e6>have a brain aneurism in 5 minutes and then everyone would instantly be better off. no one would feel guilty, or hurt, just relieved. no more burden, no more me fucking up, its just over</e6>.but maybe all that dreaming is just because <e7>im a coward. to afraid to actually try to be better</e7>. i dont know. but dying sure would be a lot simpler."

"sometimes i can ignore my body but when i pay attention to it i get into a depressing spiral. unfortunately for me i have an intersex condition and <e1>a ton of little scars and dots over my body</e1> from <e2>being clumsy or from surger</e2>y, hyperpigmentation and uneven skin tone and it's all magnified when i look under bright light. it's so hard and i still <e3>need to get some corrective surgery</e3> because <e4>my body is maleish at best</e4>. i don't know if i'm asexual or if i'm just to <e5>ashamed to let anyone see me naked ever</e5> because i <e6>have never let anyone close to me in that way</e6>. i feel like i could never do anything with because my body is so ugly and i feel like i'm going to be alone forever. i just needed to vent. i hatethat i'm stuck in this body and that everyone and i mean everyone looks better than me."

"i feel unwanted everywhere, at home, with school, with friends, even on reddit. i just got called a bloated n*gger by some internet troll on a recent picture. i know i have a fat face its been an insecurity since forever and i know its just the internet but ive had such a horrible day and week that comment drove me over the edgei feel so alone, my issues are so trivial in the grand scheme but it doesnt change how hopeless i feel"

"<e1>my girlfriend broke up with me</e1> because <e2>she lost interest in me and didnt want commitment</e2> and now were in a friends with benefits type relationship and we still kiss and hug and things like that but none of the like actual feeling that shes mine and being in love and im probably the lowest ive ever been anyway i started having a shot of whisky most mornings and snorting things like ibuprofen, paracetamol and melatonin and mixing melatonin with alcohol to get a sort of high and im on the verge of sh again and im only 15 and i dont know what to do with myself i stopped going to school out of anxiety to the point i was throwing up so i sit alone all day either sleeping or being depressed and i dont even know what im doing anymore i feel like im in a downward spiral and im trying to grasp onto something to keep me from falling but im too tired and exhausted all the time"

"<e1>everytime i enjoy something, this existential crisis thing gets me suddenly</e1>. it <e2>repeats every week and maintains 3 days</e2>. on those three days i fell empty like an object. what is even an object? i dont even think obejcts are entities. im <e3>tired</e3>"

"i was depressed for 6 years, went to therapy, found my ""root"" and worked on it for a year. i was finally over the hill, enjoyed life and saw a bright future... then everything went downhill...the past months i got more and more tired. i havent heard from friends in a ""friend""-way in ages, i get a message when someone needs something. my roommate accepts my existence, i guess. the girl i was dating just ghosted me for no apparent reason.well, i am tired, everyday i wish for something to happen to me. atleast i dont have to smile at everyone when i am at work,  god bless those masks... the worse thing of all, i am an overthinker. i spend more time in my thoughts than i do in reality. every path in my life seems exhausting, everything painful. if i wouldnt be working out, i would probably just sleep every day. noone is waiting for me. a succesful life doesnt mean anything, if i would be living a lonely life.sometimes i dream of running away, laying in a green field with a blue sky above me...thats how my ""paradise"" would look like... can't wait for this shitshow of a life to be over and i can be something else than just ""tired""."

"i have ups and downs but when the downs happen they're shit. i can go weeks feeling like a normal person then all of a sudden i'm crying all the time. the littlest things set me off and i feel like i don't want to be alive anymore. i <e1>have a child</e1> so i <e2>don't think id kill myself</e2> but i feel guilty for feeling like i want to. i'm in a circle of drinking (5 days without rn, woo go me /s), not eating or sleeping properly and i haven't worked for 4 years (except odd cash in hand jobs). i know what i'm supposed to do to try and help myself but there's so much i don't know where to begin and what's even the point when i know il fail anyway."
<e1>to off myself when i get a happy relationship for 1 year the end it all even my life</e1> because i <e2>feel that everyone is happy even without me</e2>???

"~ linkin parkso, i literally don't know what happened to my life. i've always been a high achiever. yeah i've made a bunch of attempts on my life but that didn't stop me from traveling to 7 countries, getting a full ride scholarship to college as a poor first gen student, earning a state title for discus throwing, heading clubs, and making amazing friends.post graduating, i'm unemployed and completely hopeless. my cognitive skills have rapidly deteriorated and i don't even feel like i can emotionally connect with family or friends. my social skills have become garbage, my hobbies no longer drive me, and i have lost all zest for life. i just want to go so bad and see no other way things could end for me.i'm legitimately just a garbage individual with nothing to offer anyone. i'm so ashamed of myself and everyday i beg the world to end me but continue to wake up nevertheless. i never thought my memory, processing abilities, and social skills would be completely robbed from me to this point. high functioning depression to worthlessness.i want to clean my room once and for all, pay off my credit cards, and self immolate to save my family the 20k burial fee but i don't have the energy. i'll probably just walk to the liquor store."

for awhile i was fine. i finally got back into a healthy relationship but it feels like its slowly becoming distant. she said its because shes <e1>stressed out</e1> because of <e2>school and work</e2> but even with her finals over it feels so distant. im a bit scared. im scared to make a wrong decision if i want to break up with her. i cant tell. i dont know what to feel. i feel a bit empty again.

"i am surprised. i genuinely <e1>feel so much better</e1> after <e2>limiting my use on social media</e2>. i feel like all the worlds expectations is off my shoulders so that i can live how i want without someone telling me what im doing is bad all the time. telling me how to live my life etc. i am happy that like i dont have to see all the negativity and toxic posts that comes with social media everyday. im happy that i dont have to constantly compare myself to others anymore. i feel better, not fully but a little bit. its even helping me see everything in a more positive light. i dont feel as depressed as i used to. i do have to figure out my boredom and overthinking about life problem though. which i can probs solve with mediation."

"i dwell in <e1>sadness</e1>. everytime i <e2>experience just a moment of joy, i'll immediately shut myself down to be depressed</e2>. i <e3>remind myself of the bad things in life, even when everything is going my way, and then cry about no progress being made</e3>.i'll <e4>constantly think about how to ruin these beautiful moments, how to stop having a good time, and how to maximize my self inflicted misery</e4>.i'm truly spoiled. i don't appreciate this life and all the good things it has to offer. i slap the happiness right out of helping hands trying to reach out.i hate myself."

im recently homeless (usa) and im struggling so hard with my depression. ive been couch surfing and i wake up every morning physically exhausted. i feel so discouraged and alone and i dont know what to do. im trying to be grateful for my physical health and the fact that ive been able to have a roof over my head (so far) but im not sure what tomorrow will bring. every day i wake up figuring out where im going to sleep at night and im struggling so hard to stay alive. the only thing thats giving me the slightest bit of hope is praying and what my therapist recently told me youre going to feel worse before you start to feel better. i <e1>hope this is my rock bottom</e1> because <e2>i dont know how much more i can take this</e2>.

"i told myself i wouldnt post abt this topic but i dunno. i feel so terrible. there are times where i feel so depressed and feel like ending it but there are also times where i feel okay that it makes me wonder if im rlly depressed or if im just faking it. this has been a continuous cycle for a long time and im honestly so so tired of it. i <e1>dont feel validated</e1> because there's always <e2>this buggering thought that i might just be faking it but at the same time it hurts sm</e2>. during those episodes or moments, i feel so sad, sometimes to the point of wanting to cause **smth to myself. this is driving me crazy."

"troughout the last year ive been trying to have a healthy life, and to sum it up, i now do 1 hour exercise a day, cook my own healthy foods, do 1 hour of reading, and other one hour dedicated to learning a new language(english), yknow trying to be the best i can, all these activities feel natural by now, its not unpleasent, neither pleasent. but by the end of the day i just remember how fucking miserable i feel, and i cry, sometimes a lot. tbh i think one of the big reasons is lack of a relationship, but the way i see, the moment i possibly get into one, maybe it wont change, im never satisfied, dont know how much i can keep pretending to family and friends that i dont fantasize about killing myself daily.."

i just dont feel anything anymore. like i can laugh at things and enjoy being around people but i just don't feel happy with myself. i <e1>don't dare talk about it with other people</e1> because i <e2>feel they won't understand where i'm coming from or will be shut out</e2> because i <e3>guess my problems are just too overbearing</e3>. i'm just sick of living everyday pretending that everything will be ok in the end. my ex left me some months ago and she tries to be friends with me and talk to me and tells me about how great of a man she has now and i pretend i'm ok with it but <e4>everyday my heart aches</e4> because i <e5>wasn't good enough for her</e5>. i didn't choose to be this way. i just wanna be gone.

a big part of my depression ive noticed recently is im not actually depressed about any specific thing. objectively things are going well and most of the time i can handle it but when that passenger gets in the back of your head i just find that all the small stuff is so consuming and terrible its so bad. no point to this realky. i just hate that i feel like this and will feel like this on and off for the rest of my life probably

sometimes i feel like i am taking having depression to get away from college work and responsibilities. i do have everything needed for a "good life" and my parents tell me that i have nothing to be sad about. i wonder if this is just my imagination to get away from it all.

hi  i will try to keep this short. i <e1>have depression</e1> i <e2>get a lot of suicidal thoughts</e2> because i <e3>have nothing i have no friends that check up on me i wish i wasnt all lonely</e3>. my family <e4>thinks im odd</e4> so they <e5>dont talk to me</e5> and my parents <e6>dont believe i have depression</e6> they think <e7>i have alot of friends</e7> but in reality i dont. i <e8>dont relate to anyone i cant even keep a conversation going</e8>. so i <e9>started smoking weed</e9> i didnt like it at first but a week later i just started smoking everyday and it messed up my life even more. i liked the high i enjoyed myself i had time to do everything my mind wasnt all over the place alone 3 months later im still smoking weed daily and when im sober all of these unwanted thoughts flood back in my head. when im sober i remember how much of a failure i am. my grades and how everyone is disappointed in meedit: i cant find jobs because of drug test but its the only thing that keeps me mentally stable.

"im a 20 year old female diagnosed with depression, anxiety, and ptsd. i take lexapro 20mg every night and have been having panic attacks again lately and feeling down almost every night. i go days without feeling happy and dont know what to do."

"i know everyone has differing opinions on medicating for those who are depressed. six months ago i got diagnosed with clinical depression and generalized anxiety disorder and when i first began this living hell of a journey, i was 100% set on not getting medicated. nothing against those who do i just didnt feel like it was for me. since then ive <e1>had too many extremely terrible depressive spirals, debilitating panic attacks, and a handful of good days but mostly bad</e1>, as im sure you all can relate to. today, after <e2>being instructed by my therapist that medicating might be a good idea</e2>, ive <e3>decided to go to my gp and see what she has to say</e3>. im more than nervous and feel like im giving up and feel so weak. any kind words/advice/experience would really help right now. thanks"

"long story short im fairly certain i have depression and am working on getting help. i have little to no cares about much except for my job, a girl, a car,  and sleep. i barely eat, have episodes where i vividly and constantly think of ways to end it all, have little to no motivation for school work. but because i <e1>still make an effort to go and do these few things</e1>, <e2>my parents dont think its that bad</e2>."

i had a dream.cant get it out of my head. i was never wanted. since birth. never knew how it felt to be truly wanted or loved. i guess i never deserved it.  only for what i can do. i guess im ok with that. never really had a choice. my fate was chosen for me. cursed at birth. well even before that. been that way since my first memories. i try to be kind. considerate. understanding. i guess after all these years the fact that my <e1>heart will never feel loved or have a home is gettin too painful to bare</e1>. i <e2>cant see tomorrow anymore</e2>. i <e3>dont want help</e3>. i just <e4>want to close my eyes. forever</e4>. its been a painfully cold and lonely life. its getting harder to breathe. im loosing my fight.

"some peoples spirit/soul dies way before their physical body does and they either become a parody of their former self, or even worse they become a devotee to distractions like work or wealth, as a way to ignore the erosion of one's spirit.those truly happy have both deaths at the same moment and it is open for debate whether their bliss comes from a place of ignorance or personal revelation."

"im miserable at work. i dread going in the morning. i dread it when im there.i think <e1>work is always going to suck</e1> because <e2>its work</e2>. but idk how much longer i can last feeling this way daily.i want to quit, but if i dont get another job first, it <e3>will be a lot harder to do so</e3> because i <e4>will have less leverage to keep my current pay and it will look bad that im unemployed</e4>.not to mention i will <e5>probably end up sleeping all morning/afternoon like i do on my 2 days off if im not working</e5>.so thats <e6>why i keep going</e6>.i look almost daily on linkedin, indeed, and have applied to a couple positions, but have heard nothing back.<e7>the idea of starting somewhere new is also something im not looking forward too, as well as probably having to drive farther</e7> since <e8>my job is about a mile from my house</e8>. also it would really suck having to wake up any earlier.sorry if this seems pointless. i just needed to verbalize my thoughts. maybe someone can relate.well, off to sleep i go. continuing the cycle of being miserable every day."

"so yeah, my biggest concern in life was, and still is, about who i've become. i've changed so much over the last few years, and i've become a whole different person. however, i hide my real self from my family, and my friends, not because they wouldn't accept it, but because i <e1>chose that i will be the one making this sacrifice</e1> so <e2>my life doesn't get ruined</e2>. i grew up with my grandparents, and they raised me into an exceptional person. but the reality is that that's not who i really am. i still think that if my young self saw me today would be sad, that i've somehow disappointed him and i've ended up in a bad place. but none of that is the truth. your beliefs, your perception of the world, your habits and what you enjoy change all the time. you don't have to hate yourself if you didn't become who your family raised you to be. you're not different, you are normal. you are you. you are not me. if you are not you, who will be? just accept yourself for who you are, and strive to become even greater (if that's what you want of course).(please don't try to convince me to show my reveal my true self to the people surrounding me, it's my choice to do what i've chosen to do, i may change my mind someday."
every thing is so bad all the time ???since i was a kid. i just need a break im so desperate for a break. it hurts so much. im so tired. i just need a break

"i find it truly baffling to think how ancient people were able to pass time with not so much entertainment as we have today?? we have so many outlets today to entertain and distract ourselves with to pass the time be it social media, video games, books, youtube videos, netflix etc. yet we have hard time dealing with ourselves once there is nothing to entertain us. boredom can be a very malicious thing if you are suffering a sense of dread to life and everything that goes in it. no wonder people are desperate to seek out things outside of themselves to just stay sane wether be a life partner, marriage, kids, wealth, etc...i would not wish existence on the worst of my enemies let alone give birth to people into this wretched reality. please think three times of that before having another baby"

"i go from feeling real bad to feeling nothing ? even the fantasies i used to have about escaping my current life dont excite or intrigue me anymore. nothing does. i dont want to do this anymore but offing myself seems like too much work and pain just to get to the peaceful non-existence of the other side.i dont know. i go between thinking hey you dont wanna die! and but do you really wanna live? you know? meh idk maybe thisll pass. hope yall are having a good night. well, a better one than im having."
"i'm tired of living. nothings going right, my mom is mad at me because i've given up with school. what other purpose do i have in life. there's nothing for me in the future."
