i hate having mental problems i have been to counseling since i was 4 or 5 and nothing is changing it hit me in 5th grade that ive been <e1>depressed</e1> ever since because <e2>of multiple events happening in my life</e2> like my parents being divorced growing up poor and being kidnapped and now im in high school still going through multiple events thats terrible and i now have 0 motivation to live. there is nothing to keep me going and basically im just living just to be living. ive wanted to commit suicide for a while and theres nothing really stopping me. sometimes i wish i had someone that cares about me truly someone that will be by my side and not judge me off my anxiety and mental issues i really dislike myself as a person

"back when i was still in school, i would <e1>stay up all night playing games</e1>, it <e2>felt purposeful and so addicting, i could get so immersed into certain games and feel as though im a part of it</e2>, now there's none of that happening, i just downloaded a nice popular game, and feel almost nothing, im literally forcing myself to play and buy dlcs, but then i start to think what's the point?"

"i'm so unspeakably angry at life. my life isn't even that hard. but the <e1>rage that fills me when tiny things go wrong, makes me want to rage</e1>; smash my face into the pavement, gouge my eyes out, punch myself in the face. probably because i <e2>hate myself so goddamm much it would please me to hurt myself</e2>. and the thought of how simple, how purely easy it would be to end it all, melts that rage."

"man have i been feeling like shit i genuinely was debating on ending it this weekend but my friend today sent me a box of edible arrangements and told me i was someone she cared about. it made me smile really wide for the first time in a while, and it was a smile i didnt have to feel guilty about.i know ill be back to feeling shit soon but im just happy for now"

i am an introvert that works in outside sales. at the end of each work day i am so mentally exhausted that i legit struggle to even browse social media. i <e1>barely have any friends</e1> because i <e2>have no time to invest in friendships</e2> because i work so much and at the end of the day i <e3>dont have the energy anyway</e3>. it <e4>sucks</e4> because i feel like <e5>im caught in a never ending circle</e5>. i <e6>have barely any friends</e6> because i <e7>dont put much effort into making them and i dont put much effort in</e7> because i am <e8>exhausted</e8>. i do have depression and a mild case of insomnia and i was curious if they were part of my problem.

"try to blow some time playing videogames, but it just makes me feel frustrated and angry, very little satisfaction. i feel overall meaningless, what is the point in living, there just isn't a point. you are born, and you are alive, and then you die. that's all there is in life, time you can spend freely with no objectives given.so what happens to people like me, who have no objectives of their own? those who want nothing from life? i want to be put out of my misery sometimes, would make things a hell of a lot easier. but then i decide i want to live and do things, but can think of nothing to do. what the hell is my purpose. what am i to do? i want to feel satisfied with my life. i don't know how."

"im <e1>17</e1> so <e2>i know</e2> everyone's gonna tell me shit like ""you have the world ahead of youuu and blah blah blah but like ... i highly doubt this shit gets any better and i'm willing to bet my life on it lol. its been <e3>a rough couple of years</e3> and so i told myself that <e4>i'm gonna dorm at college and do coke and have a great time</e4>, but now i'm forced to commute stuck in my shoebox room with my parents and they asked me something along the lines of "" what happens if you wrack up all this debt and then start flunking"" and my first thought was absolutely kill myself, like i'm almost sure this is the way to go. i have no idea why i'm posting this but if only i told my young little happy self a couple years ago that it was gonna get this bad, she would have enjoyed her time more."

"i <e1>hate my life</e1>, i <e2>can't be happy</e2> and i <e3>can't off myself</e3>. i wish i could sh again but it's impossible in my current situation. it all feels fake everything feels like it's a simulation, frankly i never planned to live past the age of 17 but here we are one year later. i wonder how long i'll keep being a stupid waste of space before i finally i get it through my head that no one wants me and the world won't be any the less if i'm gone."

"i have struggled this entire academic semester but somehow managed to get a perfect score a final exam. this should have been great news for me but i am writing it off as a coincidence. i am <e1>confused</e1> with myself because <e2>i understand i did really well and literally cant achieve more than a 100%</e2>, but honestly i feel like i could have done better somehow.every time i try to compliment myself or allow myself to feel pride i counter it with something negative or false. for example, ill say you got a perfect score you should be proud i think no you could have done better or the score was a mistake and the professor probably graded the exam incorrectlyanyone else experience anything similar? have you found any solutions that help you allow yourself to receive compliments and be proud of your personal achievements?"

"theres only one thing that <e1>gives me joy<e1> right now. it makes me <e2>feel worth something</e2>. it makes me <e3>feel just, so happy</e3>. but i can only do this thing with other people, i cant do it alone (physically). so im just fucking miserable unless im doing this thing and i can only do it for a few hours every day. what the hell do i do. im just. so upset."

"this is a follow up post.my gf and i have been together 7 years with some bumps along the way.i always told myself if i get cheated on i could never marry that girl.well i found some evidence that literally shattered my heart.what makes it worse is the things i saw and read are things i only wish we would do together. it would be the perfect relationship.i have a fantastic home, job, dogs. i try to make her happy in every way. i just feel we will never get to that level again.we live together and sometimes its even hard to look at her.the thing is i have no problem getting women, but i loved her! like truly loved her and she will never know she was actually my first.i just know were going through the motions and <e1>she says she loves me</e1> because i <e2>think she likes the life ive built for us</e2>.just in a such a shitty state and normally i am happy, optimistic and go getter! and i love sex! we hardly ever have sex anymlre and when we do its almost traumatizing."

"ok please just read the whole post because i know this may sound like i'm joking but i swear to god i'm not.so i don't really leave the house much. i usually only leave to go on nightwalks around my neighborhood but the last few times i've gone i swear to god i feel like someone is following me. i'll be walking down the sidewalk and hear the sound of someone running at me full speed from behind but when i turn around no one is there. i've stopped going on nightwalks so much and <e1>when i do i take my dog</e1> as <e2>i feel much safer with her around</e2>.now it's started getting worse. at night when i'm trying to fall asleep or do anything i swear i hear someone tapping at my window or knocking on my doors. i <e3>know it's not real</e3> becuase when someone <e4>is really at my door my dog barks her head off to let me know</e4>, even if she's in a deep sleep. but it still freaks me the fuck out.sometimes i'll hear tapping at my window and look out and see nothing but lately i'm just too freaked out to look. i just cover my ears and wait for it to stop.i honestly don't know what to do. i <e5>feel like i'm going fucking insane</e5> because <e6>on one hand i know it's not real but on the other it just feels real</e6> yknow?"

"i've been on a couple of meds throughout my life: sertraline, fluoxetine, escitalopram, quetiapine, alprazolam and oxcarbazepine.but i swear, other from making me really sleepy (wich i hate so so so so much) i don't feel they have ever done much for my mood.i know you're supposed to pair meds with therapy and i'm doing that but it makes me even more <e1>confused</e1>, cuz <e2>idk what's making me feel better when i do feel better</e2>.recently i (kinda dumbly tbh) <e3>stopped taking my meds</e3> because <e4>i ran out</e4>, and my mom made me feel paranoid that i maybe don't even need them so i thought nothing really would happen, and i wanted to stop feeling sleepy all the time.but... i've been feeling very bad these days. like, relapsing on sh and panic attacks bad. but i still am not sure how much it's because of not being on meds.i would hate to be overeacting. i've been told even by the psychiatrist that i tend to exaggerate and i already feel like he doesn't believe most of the things i say to him.i finally gathered courage to make an appointment with the psychiatrist, it's on tuesday and i'm shaking about what to say. i'm very embarrassed and i feel he's gonna be pissed.i feel very sad and ashamed guys."

"i find it hilarious that unless im on the verge of ending it, no one around me pays attention. i recently relapsed into another depressive episode and as soon as i did everyone just went quite. its like they only want to have conversations with me when im mentally okay but when i actually need their help, no where to be found. and it <e1>sucks</e1> because i <e2>always answer their calls or text and they just dont seem to ever reciprocate</e2>. yet, when im like i want to end it ohh everyone comes flocking. i guess i cant blame they who would want their energy drained by a depressive person. i guess streaming services, porn and food will get me through it again or not."

i really am its awful i know i can get help but i have this sense of helplessness? anyone else? like i know what i have to do but i just dont have the strength to do it. im so used to being miserable and knowing my life will end soon that im afraid of the thought of being happy. im afraid. and drowning in hopelessness.

i have handled/suffered my depression for years. i can normally handle the constant low grade stuff that stuff in the background the dark cloud looming in the distance.this last 6 months i have found myself failing. i'm putting on a mask trying to keep everyone from worrying about me. i don't like pity and i would feel guilty telling them i feel like i want to abandon the relationships that have supported me. i'm losing that fight with my depression it's exploiting the cracks and pushing me away from them bit by bit. today i <e1>deleted my last social media account that my friends follow</e1> because <e2>the depression has been telling me for months they only follow you out of pity</e2>. you have nothing of value to say.i decided two weeks ago to find a dr who could prescibe me something before i let these emotions and thoughts terminate my support system. i hope they can see me and get me help quickly. i just can't keep it up.thanks for letting me just say this without trying to cheer me up or make me feel guilty for unloading negative emotions

i feel so fucking guilty like when people talk to me i have so much trouble paying attention like my mind is elsewhere and i have such obsessive thoughts like im just thinking about misery anyone else lol its so distracting i just cant with this man

whenever i feel happy and elated i know in the back of my mind that i will soon fall into another depression episode. its a crash. im never able to feel happy or at ease. every time i do im <e1>unable to enjoy it</e1> because of <e2>a creeping fear in the back of my mind of things going wrong in the future</e2>.

"i (25) am going through my first loss of an adult friend. he was a work friend and we worked together for about 2 years and we would routinely get drinks together with our significant others. he also has anxiety and depression and hasnt been himself for months, but i tried my best to be supportive and loving. he got a better job and quit and again super supportive and super happy for him on my end and now hes stopped answering my texts. i <e1>know hes not mentally doing well either</e1> so i <e2>dont want to set him off</e2>, but im tired of walking on eggshells. some of my biggest insecurities are that im always the one to reach out, but no one ever reaches out to me. i feel like im so excited to be friends with people, but no one ever feels that way about being my friend. i was a really shy kid growing up and it was always hard to make friends and it still is a challenge for me. this is my first loss of a friend in a long time and its just hitting all my insecurities."

"one of my guy friends recently told me that i <e1>have a reputation of being a whore</e1>. i pretended it didnt bother me but it does. i like sex, im not afraid to express my sexuality, i make sexual jokes, etc., but i dont sleep around with every guy at my school. ive slept with 2 people from my school and yet somehow im the town bicycle. it <e2>hurts</e2> because i <e3>try so hard to be kind and respectful of everyone</e3>. when people ive been with in the past have hurt me i <e4>didnt hurt them back</e4> because im <e5>not spiteful</e5>. when people tell other people private things about me i dont try to do the same. i guess thats my problem. i never can stand up for myself. thats why i get used all the time. i wish i could ignore what everyone else thinks but its so hard knowing that so many people think one thing about you, that you dont even know."

"i havent posted here in quite some time. the past year was weird and bad for a lot of reasons as we know but personally, i felt ok. i felt, as i call it, sober.and now things are opening up again and my friends wanna make plans and im not ready. im scared and anxious and its making me sad. im starting to remember that <e1>i have been ok</e1> because <e2>i have been alone</e2>. being with people, comparing myself to them and my life to theirs makes me feel worse. i dont want to hear about peoples loving families, i dont want to see people just be in love, be normal, and i know it sounds horrible but seeing people be happy makes me sad. of course im not wishing them harm but i see what im missing out on.i dont know how to go back to life when my clothes to fit me, when im scared of full length mirrors, and jealous of every genuine smile under all the masks.i want the pandemic to end but i dont want my life to begin."

"<e1>my first psychiatrist has cancer and is getting treatment in another country</e1>. i <e2>got a new psychiatrist</e2> and he barely even tried helping me. all i got is generic questions and after telling me that my meds are starting to lose effect he still told me to just keep taking them. oh yeah, did i mention that i'm back to being suicidal nearly everyday?? i'm back to being unable to do complex tasks and my brain is just empty. just like the way i was before taking my meds.i <e3>didn't even get the privilege of having a one on one conversation</e3> cause <e4>he just had my mom sitting there listening to all this bullshit</e4>. all i got from this session is him telling me to continue my meds and wait until my old psychiatrist gets back to the country. i waited two entire months of hell just to get some useless words. i have to travel and waste gas, money and time when all i had to hear was to continue my meds.<e5>fuck this, fuck my meds that barely work, and fuck you psychiatrist</e5> for <e6>barely doing anything or listening to what i had to say about my meds</e6>.i don't want to take these meds anymore, they're a scam, they don't help and at this point i don't want help. just let me live my life in isolation and i'll end it all when i feel like it."

he complains that i don't hug him or kiss him to the point where he forbid me from going out or using my phone. one day he barged into my room and i said hi and he just left and complained to my mom that i didn't show him some affection..? i want to be clear that i never disrespected my parents but my father requires too much pampering otherwise i would get grounded. to tell you the truth i'm not a touchy person and struggle with showing emotions esp towards men yes and even my father. it makes me super uncomfortable and i'm extremely shy by nature. even when i try to have a conversation with him he either doesn't interact or shouts at me that i'm wrong and don't understand a thing. i just feel the whole situation is <e1>too childish and sick</e1> bc i always <e2>get punished for these stupid things</e2> and it's burning me inside bit by bit. it's becoming worse day by day.

"for the past year ive been <e1>working on losing weight</e1> to <e2>enlist in the army reserve</e2>. i <e3>have everything planned out</e3>. i going to enlist, complete training and then use the gi bill to go to a coding bootcamp( i already have a degree in business administration). currently, i quit my really shitty job at a help desk, which i spent 2 yrs at, and got a part time job while simultaneously teaching myself to code and drop the rest of the weight. ive been doing the part time/coding/weight loss for almost 5 months and im incredibly discouraged. ive lost 20lbs but my bodyfat percentage (which is what they are using to get me in) is anywhere from 37-32%, so inconsistent as fuck. my recruiter is saying i maybe ready to get a ship date, not leave, just get a date to leave in july. i just feel like im not good enough, and im depressed and disappointed with my life. im working so so hard but getting minuscule results. and while everyone my age has a good paying job, im stuck at a part time gig with little to no technical skills to get better employment. everyone says just keep doing what youre doing and stay positive but my life is garbage and i cant seem to get me shit together."

"i fucking hate myself. every time something feels good and stable, it never lasts and i find myself falling into my spinning wheel of negativity. im disgusted with how i look, yet i do nothing to change it permanently. i so desperately want to feel better, but i also feel like i self sabotage.sorry if this didnt make sense. im just in bed, venting, and trying not to cry."

"i am <e1>tired of feeling less than others</e1>, that whenever i <e2>try to do what i think is good and help others and they despise my help and also tell me that i am wrong in what i do</e2>. i feel <e3>so alone</e3>, i have <e4>so many friends and so much loneliness</e4>, <e5>my family almost never supports me and my father could not be at my most important stage to advise me</e5>.   my conflicts with my family are constant, with me and with each other, it is a total disaster and i am included in it, i even look like a black sheep for suffering certain anger problems but believe me that i do what i can to treat them as with meditation and other advice given by psychologists but there come times where they act unfairly towards my actions, i seek the common good with them, i swear, and yet they tell me that they are wrong.i came here in search of a place to express myself and in a way to release ""stress"".i did not come looking for attention but if someone thinks they can help i thank"

today we had someone in our familys dog for a couple hours and since where not allowed to have pets and im a really big animal person that made me pretty happy but also with the vr game i play normally i come with people who just ruin the game but today i only found nice funny people but the best thing was that a made a couple people laugh pretty hard one even started completely wheezing and then i realized even harder that <e1>one of the only things that make me happy is making other people happy and animals and i had both of those today</e1> so <e2>overall pretty good dayedit</e2>: i also dont have school this week so even better and that woudnt have happened otherwise

"im somehow somewhat up for a promotion. although i have had <e1>several major screwups</e1> recently so <e2>maybe not so much now</e2>. i <e3>hate my job</e3> and <e4>it exacerbates a number of major issues i have from working too much to other compulsive issues  to absolutely destroying my will to do anything</e4>. im not great at it but im at the experience level o need to movie on whether that is as a promotion or moving internally.im supposed to talk with my manager about what my goals are. but im too depressed to do anything and if i agree to a promotion, thats willfully writing off another year of life dedicated to something i know will be all consuming and keep me a state i hate."

"i hate working full time, but then i hate going to university, i hate everything it seems and would be happy to be left alone to be honest. <e1>the sertraline keeps me calm and stops me wanting to kill myself</e1> so i'm <e2>better off on them even tho i end up constantly tired</e2>.v"

"i've been struggling with depression and self-hatred for the last six months and although i've had thoughts about how the world wouldn't care if i passed away i never have ever gotten to the point where i wanted to act on these thoughts. today though, i got really scared of my wrists? i don't know if im just <e1>engaging with too much depression content</e1> since <e2>im reading up on it more</e2> but i <e3>had to put on full sleeved clothing and pants</e3> because i <e4>couldn't bare to have my skin in the open</e4>. i put away all the sharp things too and i tried to distract myself. it's not that i want to hurt myselfi'm not actively thinking about self-hatred or suicide when i get those violent thoughts. it's almost like there's a impulse acting as another person that's out of control and wants to hurt me even though i know i literally don't want to. idk if that makes sense... am i going insane... would appreciate any explanation or advice  im scared <3"

"um clarification, i'm 13 and have diagnosed depression and i'm either dying( getting closer and closer to the point of well su*cide) or giving up on living( losing the things that used to make me happy and feeling numbness).maybe those are the same things but i don't care. i miss enjoy my days, i miss the butterflies i used to get when talking with my partner. i miss having friends and not worrying they'll use my trauma against me.i miss being a kid. i miss not caring if people judged me about my weight. i missed my parents being okay with me not being perfect. i miss having fun. i miss my dog.i miss my old life. a life where i didn't start writing a new book in hopes of it becoming a get away from reality and for it to give me my purpose again. a life where i don't <e1>spend hours researching fish care and get a community tank of fish of different care types that live 5+ years</e1> so i <e2>had something to take care of</e2>. a life where i would <e3>cuddle with my cat</e3> not because i was sad but because i <e4>waa bored</e4>.i'm turning 14 this september and i'm worried i won't last that long.one of the few people who has cared and helped me through this is my partner, and i think he's giving up on me. or maybe he's bored of us. either way i don't think he actually cares about me anymore."

"in the past two weeks, ive hung out with my friends outside of school 3 times. that sounds like nothing, but for someone who normally hangs out with them once a month outside of school and <e1>is terrified of driving to friends houses, thats pretty huge</e1>. thats <e2>supposed to be an accomplishment</e2>, and what every source ever says will help with depression. so why did it do nothing? i feel like it didnt even slow down my spiraling, it <e3>felt useless snd im frustrated</e3> cause <e4>it usually helps and was supposed to work</e4> and its not doing anything. i know its not a cure all, but isnt it supposed to help? i dont know what to do. school ends in 2 weeks, im supposed to be happy and enjoying my summer, but i just feel worse than before. i dont want to go out with my friends anymore, i feel so tired and stressed. i dont know what to do, im just frustrated that a solutions thats worked in the past  isnt doing crap for me.i realize this probably sounds like im using my friends and im horrible person, but im not. i genuinely love them and hang out with them during school, i just have a hard time getting myself to go out with them outside of that because i typically dont feel well and get very tired and stressed."
please <e1>someone talk to me</e1>. im <e2>feeling extremely depressed</e2> and i just feel like giving up. i just want someone to talk to. please and thank you.

"i'm 25 and live in complete isolation, i'm alone.there is no one i can talk to, no one not even myself can be helped. at this point i have given up.i'm so tired. so so tired of trying and failing, so tired of trying and putting in the effort to get better and improve myself. only to get crushed, over and over again. i cry myself to sleep everyday. and wonder when i'll try to kill myself again. i'm fully convinced i wont make it past 2021. everything was going so well till i had my car accident. i had something that belonged to me and now its gone. i felt a sense of independence. even if i was back with my parents. i had something that belonged to me completely. im writing this outside in the cold looking at a river i want to jump in and drown myself.this life has nothing left for me. my siblings don't talk to me, i have no friends. my job is shit. i'm tired of failing over and over again. all this time i've wasted 5 years working and dedicating myself to a company that in the end i have 0 to show for. other people my age are living alone, starting families. i want that but i know i can't get that.my heart aches everyday."

"for the past couple of months, i have been having this weird feeling inside me, i don't really know how to describe it, but i guess all you need to know is that feeling makes me unhappy, i don't know what this feeling is or why its happening to me, i have a good life, nothing to complain about. but this feeling haunts me. but sometimes it goes away at random for about 1-2 weeks and i start feeling happy again and just enjoy life, but it comes back at random. i cant figure out why i'm feeling this, or what this feeling represents."

"i'm really very <e1>confused about where i'm as a person</e1>. i <e2>don't know what i'm doing in my life</e2> but i'm doing things and i don't really know what. i <e3>rarely remember things</e3>. i <e4>feel sad most of the time</e4>. i think i'm depressed. but then again i think about the times when i'm outside with friends i can be happy with them. but at the same time i think negatively about myself. i procrastinate my work. i don't feel like doing anything. i look at my friends also and don't know what i feel. i don't know if i care about them. everyone seems so distant from me. even though they might not be. i'm scared of where i'm. i'm scared that everytime i think of a future it's blank. people say focus on today rather than the future. but what to do when the present it self is so bleak. i look at my parents, i feel like shit. they tell me to pray and all but i don't. i don't know if i believe in god or not. but i do nothing for me to show that i do believe in god. i don't know who i'm. i don't what i'm doing. i don't think i'll ever know. i don't think i'll live past these year. everyday i feel like i'm closer to dying. and it's fine i feel to die. i want to die. yet i don't want to die. i don't know what i need to hear or what i need to see to understand where i'm that's why i want your help to see where i'm."

"i am starting my first antidepressant tomorrow, lexapro 5 mg. <e1>pretty nervous about it</e1> as it <e2>is my first</e2>. any tips/experiences that i should brace myself for? im hoping this is a chance at feeling like myself again. also very scared though. help??"

"i'll admit it, i'm struggling.i can't offload this weight, this hate, this sense of feeling 'wrong' ever since i can remember.i don't feel i'm worthy of this life, a partner who loves me, kids who love me and yet i still hate myself.how do you stop self loathing if you hate your exterior self?i've been to therapy but it just seems i'm burying my problems and not actually acknowledging any of them, so then what's the point?what's the point in it all?if i can't be happy then why bother to continue?if in the end, it's all meaningless?fuck."

"it happens frequently, that feeling of disillusionment slowly creeping into my thoughts, and then it's downhill from therei question the world, the people, life... what's so special about iti don't get why i feel so detached from the world around mei see the smiles and laughter from people, but i just can't feel the sameit leaves me <e1>feeling jealous and angry</e1> that <e2>i'm left outit bothers me</e2> that i have to take meds, drink alcohol, and vape thc, just to get byonly by vaping thc, did i realize how numb and emotionless i had becomeand how hard it was to remember a time when i was really happywithout knowing it, i became an expert at masking my sadnessknown as a class clown & life of the party"

i cant stand this anymore this of who i become which is a failure and nothing in life. i dont want to work im not accomplishing anything. i hate this life. i hate myself and how i am . im mean now im in supportive living and i know deep down i given up so why <e1>cant i just go through with ending my life</e1> cause <e2>im already dead just not physically dead</e2>. <e3>no one understands me no one ever will im always alone and thats how this will always be</e3>. so <e4>im ready to take my life day goodbye to this shithole for once</e4>.

"i've dealt with depression before. i've been fairly depressed since 2015, but finally came out of it early this year. things were going good. i was working a new job, working on personal relationships, and working on projects i had wanted to do for a long time. then today, there was a freak accident. i was driving to work and my pickup started fish tailing. i usually try to have something heavy in the back to weigh it down, but i had cleaned it out recently and forgot to put anything back. i hit a patch of thick gravel and crashed head on into a concrete bridge. somehow i didn't end up going off the bridge, and i didn't get too badly injured, but the pickup got totaled. the worst part is the pickup was my dad's, and i was borrowing it, and it wasn't ensured. he says he's not mad at me but i can tell he's disappointed. i don't even know what to do. i just feel so worthless. i don't know what i could've done, but i keep beating myself up over it and i feel so stupid. i <e1>haven't talked to anyone or even moved since i got home</e1> and i just <e2>have not motivation to do anything at all</e2>. life fucking sucks."

"for some fucking reason i can't sleep at night and when i tell my mom about it requesting assistance she turns it into a lecture about grades and school. i fucking need help not some fucking lecture. when i tell her i feel depressed the answer will always be:,, you're just a kid you have nothing to worry about"" or ,,back in your age..."". i cant fucking do this anymore, only the ppl here on reddit understand and it <e1>hurts</e1> to <e2>know that strangers understand me better than my own mom</e2>. i'm thinking about never telling my problems to anyone ever. just hoarding that sadness and hate inside me."

"especially in men. a local man to me killed himself recently and the radio has adverts for men to talk about their mental health. its fucking stupid. i talk about my issues on here and get shut down as they apparently dont exist. im convinced all these people who advocate for mental health awareness havent had depression for 5 minutes. ive had it for long periods since i was about 10, people trying to tell me that talking about it helps makes me <e1>want to rip my own throat ou</e1>t, <e2>they just cant shake the idea that talking doesnt help</e2>. and they think they have a right to know why i cant tell them anyway."

"<e1>every single night.they're laughing at me. they're exposing me. they're talking trash and they're insulting me harsher and harsher. they're making me feel small and unwanted</e1> and <e2>every single night i wake up crying</e2> because of it.they're just vessels for my insecurities to speak through, but what they're saying is right.<e3>they don't know they're saying it</e3>, because <e4>they're not saying it.but it feels like them</e4>.it feels like what i fear deep down they really think of me.and i hate myself for letting it affect the way i think of them."

"everyday i wake up, is another day im angry. angry that i have to endure another day feeling like shit. it truly sucks when you feel like youre simply existing and not living.it sucks when you see others seemingly happy and enjoying their lives, doing normal/fun things. <e1>most days i dont even wanna leave my house</e1> because i <e2>hate the way i look</e2>, or <e3>dont wanna make myself feel worse by being around happy / normal people</e3> because itll just <e4>make me feel worse</e4>.the small things people do and take for granted everyday, are usually the things i wish and pray for most. simply getting out of bed and looking in the mirror and not hating my reflection..being able to afford a simply 1 bedroom apartment.. working a job that doesnt fuck up my mental health..etcive also always been the black sheep in my family and as my depression has accumulated, ive grown more and more apart from them.  they simply <e5>dont get how i feel, and ill never bother to explain it</e5>. i just let them think what they think because <e6>even if i wanted to explain, even if i tried to explain why im depressed , most likely they would say im exaggerating or being ungrateful</e6>"

"but i am actually only 30.the truth is,  i don't want to have any responsibilities,  i don't  want to work, i just want to spend my time playing games and watching shows. however, my body is in pain constantly, constant back pain,  i got hypertension and very low testosterone level, poor eye sight and poor memory."

"im sick of trying so hard in life and getting nowhere. i feel like ive just given up on living. ive stopped trying to move out, stopped doing my homework all i do is sleep all day and day dream of a better life.im so behind everyone else. im not smart enough for school. and ive done none of the normal things im supposed to do at my age. im just a sad friendless virgin whos now a neet. i wonder is this the fate of the rest of my existence............"

"ive suffered with major depressive disorder since i was a child, a couple of ptsd moments later, and my depression has worsened, and also the fact that my family has moved states a bunch of times. everyday i wake up with anxiety, and everyday i want to accept the fact that depression is just a string of emotions and thoughts all tied together, but its like my mind and body refuse to accept it. i <e1>have very treatment resistant depression</e1>, ive <e2>never responded to any medications, no matter how high the dose is</e2>, i <e3>dont respond to antipsychotics, or anti anxiety meds</e3> (except for benzos, but i do have a slight tolerance to them). as of late, ive been trying to practice acceptance therapy and dbt skills, i do let myself know that i am getting help, and i am pushing myself, but even that doesnt really help calm my nerves. i want to accept where im at in life, accept the life im living now instead of constantly fighting this. i feel like im never trying hard enough to get better. does anyone feel the same?"

"i don't care about getting a job, getting a boyfriend, losing my virginity, knowing what my college major will be, getting the best grades and internships, having some blueprint for a career or getting married. i don't know how to be a woman, to dress myself well or put on good makeup or style my hair, i don't care. i am a friendless socially stunted loser and to be honest i really don't care about the long term consequences of that either.i really don't care if people think i'm pathetic for being a neet permavirgin at this point. i mean i'll get some desk job after college eventually and not freeload off my parents but i for sure don't care about having some career passion or being some girlboss or whatever. or even dating or getting married at any point in this life.i never had any aspirations in life i just felt obligated into pretending i did by society and my family. from the time you are maybe 16 starts this never ending barrage of questions about what college you want to go to, what career you want to have, are you dating anyone yet, do you have your license yet, blah blah blahlife sucks, but there are no suicide booths, thus i will continue to do the bare minimum in life and everyone who looks down on me will just have to deal"
need help feeling sad and depressed feel down

its really insane how cruel life can be. like i dont see how life is a fluke at all honestly. this shit feels like a set up. i <e1>hate science</e1> for <e2>not telling it like it is</e2>. lifes a damn hell simulation idk why there isn't enough evidence in the world for that  by now. i think my own life is brutal and i've nearly killed myself yet i cant even fathom that its true how others have it much worse. anyways i don't think ill be alive much longer. <e3>i'm threatened to be kicked out</e3> for ' <e4>being lazy</e4> ' because i am too <e5>depressed to work</e5> and can't find a job. i don't got much money to survive long. i got enough money to buy what i need to kill myself. since i don't believe in god anymore i might aswell just do it. lifes fucking hell

"honestly, having <e1>a crush feels really good</e1> because this has been <e2>the least bored ive been in really long</e2>. he's really caring and always checks up on me when i look upset but thats also the problem. i probably <e3>started liking him</e3> because of <e4>the concern he shows me</e4> but what if kne day he just gets sick and tired of me being so depressed all the time. i always heard that being in a relationship with someone with depression is a bad idea and that it does affect the other person in <e5>the relationship negatively</e5> so im <e6>unsure if i should pursue him</e6> :( i also dont think my depression is going away anytime soon"

"i don't want to die, i don't hate my life. i'm just <e1>scared</e1>.i've seen the way i <e2>handle pretty much everything in my life, and it seems that no matter how hard i try i can never quite get the handle of things for any substantial period of time</e2>. sort of like a dream, where everything is in my mind, but i have little to no actual control.sometimes i get so anxious about the future that i just feel like i should just quit prematurely while things are sort of ok, before i screw up my life any further. and yes, i know that life is full of good moments too, but i always feel like i don't really deserve them. i don't want to die, i just want to stop living, if that makes any sense. like i wish i could become a mountain or a river spirit or something, that way i can exist and i can just watch other people enjoy their lives and let time pass."

"i have been bad for years. i don't remember being happy since 6 years nos and i'm 18. i think people look me like if they are superior than me or just think i'm weird. when i think i have a friend then kick me off. i think there's no hope for me. none will ever love me. if they are with me it's bc they are supposed to. sometimes i don't know why i do what i do. why i go to the gym ir go to college. i just do things bc i have todo to things, bad in the end nothing changes. sometimes i think that bc nobody wants me to be alive it would be better for everyone that i didn't exist. (sorry bc of my english)"

"i text, they don't reply. i walk in the street, they don't acknowledge me. i cry for help in a moment of sheer pain, everyone i reach out to just cringes and wishes that moment to just pass. i post on social media, nobody reacts. i talk to therapists, none of what they say touches me.this is really hard to deal with when you are getting close to a suicidal state of mind. when you live like this and see that nobody really values you except for family that you can't spend more than 30 minutes with, you start to logically consider suicide. suicide attempts are sometimes regarded as cries for attention and help, and they are carried out to express pain- whereas succesful suicides are just an action to end pain. don't worry, i am not suicidal at the moment- but what if i experience this rock bottom once again and decide i don't want to endure it anymore? hell, what is the point enduring it now if i will come back here again?"

"worthless. alone. alone. worthless. no one cares.just words spinning in my head today. the weather is nice for once. food on my table, favourite drink on hand. but i feel so alone. parlayed to the thought.i miss my ex. it's been 2 years since you ghosted - probably found another man. 8 years of a relationship gone. i miss you sometimes. i miss being valued by someone else.my therapist has been great. i miss her. can't afford to talk to her more than 50 minutes every few weeks though. i like seeing her little messages on social media though. makes me feel happy to know she's productive. happy. i wish i could date her.i wish i had someone i could just hit up right now romantically. i miss being in love. i miss having a future. i miss not being able to feel the pain ...i feel nothing except pain. i just want to laydown and die. you're not out there. i have to learn to be happy by myself - i told myself that. but truth is i'm lonely. i've always been lonely. being with my ex made me happy that i would someday have kids. that we were building something. then i guess the feelings for me - if she had any - faded.because that's what people do. they fade. they don't like me. i don't like me, i can't blame them. i'm just treading water. low paying job. sitting at home all day. passing time until i die ... fade away ... i am nothing."

"recently i <e1>started being skeptical about my understanding around depression</e1>, i always thought that <e2>i am strong</e2> and this <e3>can't happen to me</e3> and depression is an intense form of sadness and down vibes.last month was just too much for me i have red alerts around me coming from every direction and i just can't fix or work on anything, its not laziness its more like waiting for stuff to fix themselves. and above all of it i have to 'stay strong' and just get through with it.even though i always thought i was strong and i can take on anything and stay strong, but getting hit from every direction <e4>at the same time with intensity getting higher and higher just torn me down</e4>.i don't feel sad for myself, because i know i have it way better than other people, but i feel sad for them and i feel like i am empty, hopeless, powerless, voiceless, and i feel like i am nothing and no one, and if believe no one feels anything towards me and i present nothing to anyone."

"this state is all i've known for years, i know it so well i'm comfortable. i struggle when i forget i'm depressed and then remember i'm here.the best part is that i grew up in a loving family that cares and nothing bad ever happened to me. that makes me even a bigger piece of s***have an incredibly low self esteem. inability to achieve things with people and relationships. a complete useless looser? i can't commit to anything long term. <e1>can't study can't do sports go to the gym</e1> because <e2>i don't progress</e2>.humans seem to have some sort of reward system in them that make them want to do stuff. that is not present in me.if i got paid for being depressed i would be rich."

all day i feel tired... not tired like i didn't get enough sleep but tired to even open my eyes. i wake up 5 mins before my online classes start and i usually return to bed around an hour or two after they end. but when i am back in bed i cant sleep and i lay there for hours and hours watching stuff online. these feelings also made me kind of kill my emotions. i feel numb and i'm starting to believe i get crazy which makes me hate myself. additionally i relapsed as well and began to sh again which makes me hate myself even more. i was clean for 3 years. all down the toilet... sometimes i think what would be if my suicide attempt a few years ago didn't fail even though i am afraid to die today.

so i been realizing something latley in as everyday i have online shool and we have to write exams ofc and im just stressing out and overthinking everything  and my parents only care about my grades if i have good grades they are nice ti me but when i have bad they are angry at  me. but when my brother has bad grades they  are not angry at him so i <e1>wanntet to test my parents if they even care about me</e1>. my brother did something bad and they didnt care so i <e2>did the same thing</e2> and they sceeamed at me. they only care about my brother and my sister

"i am very <e1>lonely and i feel very lonely</e1>. <e2>my family has not wanted to know anything about me for a long time</e2>. i feel very depressed and very sad, and i <e3>have no one to share it with or with whom to vent</e3>. a <e4>psychologist wouldn't do me</e4>. they are only interested in me being around long enough to charge me. the rest do not care. i mean to have someone who really listens to me, because he cares what i say, although the only help he can give me is to listen to me."

i try my best to wake up every day in a good mood and cherish every moment that i get to experience. life has gotten harder and harder the past few years. my friends think im sad over nothing. im sad over everything. i cant remember the last time i was happy. i dont want to feel like this anymore. my beautiful fianc and step son are the only things keeping me alive and sane. i just want to fall back in love with life. i want to love myself again. after my dad died i gave up on myself and have watched myself deteriorate more and more. i dont even know what steps to take to make things better. i just want to sleep.

"coming out of a depressive episode whether it lasted 2 days or 2 months is such a refreshing feeling. it's like when you get the flu and you realize you took your health for granted and then when you finally feel better, you appreciate what it's like to be healthy.at least that's what it feels like for me. i try not to think about all the time i wasted and instead make the most of the day when i'm feeling good and do the things that make me happy. like today i decided to finally write this paper that i've been putting off for weeks, and it makes me happy to feel like i'm doing something productive. i also decided to go for a walk and get coffee and sit outside the coffee shop which made me happy.anyone else feel the same way?"

"so (i might be on the wrong sub for this stuff, but i didn't know, where to ask) for a few years now i have symptoms of a depression and my best friends always try to get me to a psychologist to get a diagnosis, but i don't know if it's worth it...i don't know, how it's in other regions of the world, but at least in the part of germany, where i live it's stupidly difficult to get a place for a therapy. some friends of mine have to wait for 9 months until they can start therapy.this wouldn't be a problem for me, but afaik if i got diagnosed, i would be forced to lay down my position as a member of the voluntary fire fighters, which is the only thing holding my life together in this weird times...and since <e1>my family isn't really supportive about mental issues</e1>, it feels like it's <e2>not worth sacrificing my favorite hobby and breaking with my family for the possibility</e2> that i might could <e3>get better someday</e3>.propably nobody will read this, but i wanted to say thank you, if you did. even if you don't say anything"

"let me start by saying that today i'm ok. some external factors have had me pretty low and i've just about got them wrapped up.i <e1>missed a day this week</e1> because <e2>i wasn't ok</e2>, and my boss needs some form of doctors note or it counts as one of two no excuse needed absences for the year.it's more complicated and less terrible than it sounds, i don't want to get into it. my job is fine.my insurance sucks, looks like a cost of about $120 everywhere i'm looking. any suggestions?"

"sometimes i feel like im suffocating. like, i go out, put a happy face on, joke around, make people laugh, people like me, whatever. cool. im the jokester, the funny one. but none of these people really know me or how much pain im in. not even the person i call my best friend. im a fraud. the walls around me are sky high and i dont let anyone see my weakness. to them, im full of life and confident. but its a lie i tell to world to hide who i am. my mind tells me im worth nothing. that i am nothing. a nobody and no one cares about me. sometimes id rather die and end it all, but most of the time i just want to wake up in a different life. i <e1>dont want to die. i just want the suffering parts of me to</e1>. so i can <e2>wake up and be the person i am fronting to the world</e2>, instead of faking it."

i'm having a really bad episode rn as this is a hard time of year for me due to grieving. i tried so hard to prevent it. i thought i was gonna be stronger than this but here i am with a messy apartment...dishes from a month ago still in the sink. too ashamed for anyone to come over. <e1>too ashamed to go out on a date</e1> from <e2>binge eating and falling off track on my weight loss journey</e2>. hygiene not the best right now but i finally showered today after 3 days. and i'm scared to lose the new person i've been talking to because of this disorder. i dont want to be seen like this.
back on the low and dysfunction. ignoring work and texts and obligations. tomorrow will suck and im <e1>anxious</e1>. <e2>too down to do anything about it today</e2>.

"im sick and tired of the same old bullshit day in and day out. im<e1>in the process of starting a new job which made me happy</e1> because i <e2>hate my current one</e2>, however that joy was stolen by some fuckwads that decided to stir shit up yesterday. fuck people, fuck covid, and fuck life"

ive been in a depressive episode for about a month for like the 5 time this year alone and now i dont have friends or a girlfriend to help me through it and ive got a feeling im going to do it in a few days ive came close so many times even actually taking paracetamol the last time and every time i keep getting closer and closer and i dont know if ill back out this time im not asking for help or anything i just wanted to someone about how i feel who wont be worried all day every day and have a panic attack

"im <e1>pissed</e1>. there was this person on tiktok talking about how she was finally able to take a shower and do her work because <e2>shes depressed</e2> and <e3>its obviously hard for her</e3>, but when i went into the comments, <e4>they were all making fun of her</e4>.what the fuck.it pisses me off how everyone in the comments think theyre so quirky and cute because theyre making fun of her for <e5>finally being able to do something that is normal for them but hard for her to do</e5> because she <e6>has a mental illness</e6>.theyre all about positive mindsets and promoting good mental health until they finally see the effects mental illnesses really have on people, and it sucks.imagine how hard for her it was to see comments making fun of her. istg i cant stand people on tiktok, theyre horrible and lack empathy.this is why <e7>people dont open up about things like this</e7>. its people like them who dont even try to understand other people just because <e8>theyre doing something thats not considered normal in their eyes that are part of the problem</e8>.you dont even need to fully understand someone to be there for them and to care for them."

"can i just ask if 2021 can kindly fuck off?! i've lost 2 of the most important people in my life within a month of one another... i'm overwhelmed at work and university and i graduated from my first degree... online!!! nobody cared.  i am just so over this year as i a literally feeling like i am in a constant limbo. i've been trying everything to stay motivated, have energy and do the most, but i literally have no power and no will to push through year.i am falling prey to my depression again after being fine actually for 3 months.. i was doing so well for 3 months and then 2021 and life was like.. bitch get back in your place! i just want to cry and not keep on doing this year. i wish i can just forward time to get rid of this shitty year.."

"i'm not suicidal, and i don't think i'm any more depressed than the next person, but in the back of my head there is always this assumption that at some point <e1>i'll end it</e1> because there's <e2>no way this is sustainable</e2>.40 hours a week, every week. <e3>everything i own/love is only available to me</e3> because <e4>i work</e4>. once i stop working it all disappears. i don't even really hate my job, but this is it? for the rest of my life? why would i do this to myself."

"im <e1>overwhelmed im underwhelmed im stressed i feel unloved i feel uncared for</e1>... i <e2>try so hard, but get nowhere</e2>.im hanging on by a limb asking for help, with no help in sight.i <e3>dont know how to help myself anymore</e3> and im <e4>falling apart</e4>."

<e1>there isn't any reason for me to leave</e1>. people will <e2>forget that i exis</e2>t until i message first or if i am of use to them.even if i invited them out all they do is <e3>message other people about how bored they are</e3>.maybe just don't ask that question unless you're ready for a truthful response.i know i haven't gave much context but i feel that myself and others have had to deal with dicks like this.

"today i was playing was playing call of duty and there was this 3 guys shit talking a guy called raj for being tamil. there were shit talking about how his tamil parents left him and got adopted buy a native women .raj even admitted it and said there's nothing he could do about it. he was quite the whole time .i presumed <e1>he might be dealing with this often</e1> as <e2>he didn't quite from the game</e2>. <e3>he was on my team</e3> so i <e4>asked him if he knew those guys and he said "" i might"</e4>". <e5>those shit talkers was so bad at the game</e5>.i couldnt hold it back so i <e6>asked raj if he wants help to shit talk these guy</e6> and he said no.they <e7>kept shit talking</e7> and i <e8>quitted the game<e8> cause i was <e9>so disgusted by it</e9>.i face thing like this everyday and i cant deal with this anymore .world is so disgusting and it keeps getting worse every day.i always wanted to move out to a another country as my parents been mentally abusing me all my child hood. now these things are everywhere. rape,child abuse, muder, war, school shootings and racism. i feel like there are no place i can go and be happy . i just feels like im caged and drowning bit by bit everyday.i really wanna kill my self rn but only thing keeping me away from that is i know killing myself doesnt gonna fix anything .but i dont think that thought gonna last any longer"

"does anyone else that struggling with depression feel proud of themselves for the little things?  like today, i <e1>washed and actually brushed my hair, and put on clean clothes, before needing to get back in bed</e1>. i <e2>can't help but feel pretty pleased with myself</e2>"

"its come to the <e1>point where i try</e1> because i <e2>dont want people to say i didnt</e2>. but really, i just want to give up. i feel useless, unneeded, desperate for some kind of positive feeling that lasts more than a day. my heart feels heavy and i cry about everything, it feels like i never run out of tears like people say i should. they just keep pouring out and with them, my soul. my world is falling apart at the seams and i cant seem to tell if i caused all of it or not. the voices in my head are getting louder as the days go on and what was once easy to ignore is becoming impossible. i can quite literally feel my heart cracking in my chest everyday, and i cant mend it. im giving up, and i dont know who to tell."

"when i started math 11 this year, i decided i wanted to finally commit to something and do well. i tried my absolute hardest in class and spent many hours studying at home. i put so much time and effort into this, thinking i could finally be as good as my friends. my mom was so proud of how determined i was.well i just <e1>failed the exam</e1> and now i <e2>want to curl up and die</e2>."

i <e1>cant hold a job and have no money to do anything</e1>. <e2>my mom is still taking care of me</e2>. i <e3>feel ashamed about it</e3>. i dont know what i can do. even showering seems like a luxury i dont deserve. i want to be in therapy to be able to say i did something to try. theres so many people struggling it makes me feel even worse. why should i get help instead? i really wish i would just go to sleep one day and never wake up. i feel like a burden on everyone. life would be much better if i would stop being a drag. who cares. im just one stupid idiot who knows what he has to do and wont do any of it.

"this happens to me alot. i always have a feeling that i'm <e1>not really depressed</e1> because i <e2>have the physical capacity to just do what needs to be done in life</e2> (working, exercice and all that). but then at the same time i'm always feeling so shitty about myself, no matter how good my life situation may be. sometimes on my way to work i would just imagine to get hit by a bus or a truck just to end this every day suffering.i would then have thoughts like : ""oh but you're not really depressed if you're able to live normaly, you're just faking it to get people's attention"".""oh and all those suicidal thoughts you're having are also fake, if you really wanted to do it you would've done it a long time ago""it's like on the outside i'm living life like a godamn robot, just going through my routine and acting ""normal"" but on the inside i'm just slowly dying and rotting away."

"so <e1>its been a long time since i had depression or felt depressed</e1>. i <e2>am very good at finding ways to avoid it or talk it out with someone</e2>. but that someone i have always turned to is going through personal things and i dont want to burden them with my stuff.i know what triggered my depression. it was work that triggered it. i love my job, but just yesterday due to overwhelming things to do, my supervisor got irritated with my scheduling process. i guess i wish the reprimand was in private, not in front of my other coworkers, i felt humiliated and embarrassed. and i do not even know why i am taking their comment so personal either, they are not even my boss, they are just a supervisor. another coworker also makes me feel very tense as i enter and mentally attacked as i leave the office. and i <e3>dont want to tell my boss</e3> because we <e4>are short staffed</e4>.anyways, thanks for listening/reading. and i will eventually leave this place, but not right now."

"hi, i am a 24 years old man with a good life, i have some hobbies i have a good job that i like but recently i started to become bored with life. it's not like i want to die right now but i think there is nothing exciting going to happen future maybe expect few moments. i'm thinking of death through hanging or some medicines. please don't respond me with some shit like ""life is beautiful"". i wanted this post to be longer but in the middle of text i decided i don't want to write more so it's kind of shitpost sorry for that"

"i <e1>cant do this anymore</e1>. my <e2>life just keeps getting worse and i just keep pretending to be ok in front of people, but when i get home i fall apart</e2>. i am so sad that i can physically feel it in my chest. went to college today and they literally had a long discussion and completely forgot i was in the room at the back of the classroom. just proves how invisible and worthless i am. i <e3>fucked up my childhood and i have no hope for my future</e3>. i am going to <e4>kill myself sometime soon</e4>.sorry that i sound like a stupid bitch"

"hi, im looking for advice as a friend of someone with anxiety and depression. a few weeks ago they said it would be better off if we stopped talking for a while, and we havent spoken since. theyve been <e1>suicidal in the past and their activity online indicates signs of loneliness</e1>, so im <e2>getting concerned</e2>.i want to reach out and initiate some sort of conversation, but im not sure how to go about it or if that would be disrespecting any boundaries. when you push someone away, would you prefer them to reach out after a while or continue to give you space? thanks for any help."

"i'm not sure it's because i have work in the morning after a day off or taking my meds late but lately, i have been feeling meh about life. nothing is fun anymore, i just bought myself a switch with two games and i'm already bored of it after less than a week. it's just the same thing every day, go to work, get bullied at work by an asshole of a co-worker, cry at home or say fuck it and walk home from work crying and not wait on a ride. i want to lose weight but i don't want to do anything about it, i feel worthless most days. i want to fix myself so i can start looking for that someone but it's like i ran out of care and the only love i get is from lucid dreams. i haven't been held in months. i don't want to die but i'm just extremely meh with how things are."

i'm even having a few suicidal thoughts but i guess i'm still very much at a better place than where i was. i hate every aspect of myself and i just wanna disappear. there are just too many bigots in the world no matter where i see even in the safe spaces. i feel like i'll never be able to belong and find a good/supportive friend group. even if i do i'll probably forever be in doubt that if they really are my friends or are pretending to be.

"it can also make me intensely aware of the tiniest of 'happy things'.like the thing that inspired me to make this post: my ginger cat is sleeping peacefully beside me on the couch, and sometimes as he's fast asleep i can't help but gently pet him.the fact that he trusts me and the peace in our house enough to not be startled, but instead do the stretch+snoot hug...there's something about having and honouring the complete trust given to me by an(y) animal, it's so pure.anyway, i hope this doesn't come across as toxic positivity, i certainly don't mean it to be that way. today is just a rare day i'm acutely aware of the love i have for tiny things some people don't seem to notice, or take for granted. the darkness i see and feel is still interrupted by tiny shiny stuff every now and then, and so far apparently that has been enough. today i am thankful for that."

"so i'm not exactly sure if this belongs here but characters in books have it so easy in a way. they have a clear goal in life, frodo must return the ring, harry must defeat voldemort, in many books characters usually <e1>know what their purpose is. and then when they fulfill this purpose they have their ending</e1>. the book ends and so do the characters. the world siezes to exists with them fulfilled and happy. and this is so beautiful. the act of ending at a right time. in life i feel like there is something i'm searching for but i don't know what it is or whether i i'll ever find it. and so i <e2>sometimes envy them so much</e2>. and i don't want to die but im not sure what i live for. or whether people do need to live for something. we could make an argument that <e3>not having anything set in stone for oneself is great</e3> because <e4>they can choose</e4>, but that's the problem. what to choose?  i just wanted to get this out."

i can't even remember the last time i actually felt happy or positive. i'm always depressed. i think last month i felt positive for literally 2 minutes about something then i went back to feeling like crap. lol pathetic

"is <e1>anyone else the happy friend</e1>? so <e2>everytime you tell your friend your not fine they don't take it seriously and think you're joking</e2>. i hate this, i was forcing myself to <e3>always laugh about shit</e3> so they <e4>think i'm fine</e4> but now i'm stuck i' this category and no one takes me seriously"

"i'm 23 (m) don't have any friend, single, unemployed, undergrad and have no talent (or maybe never has a chance to figure out untill now)i suppozed to graduate this december if i didn't f it up, since there's something happened last year that really makes me depressed back in august and was planning to end my life in january, so i left anything important and try to enjoy days passing by waiting for that moment.........but things got better now, and that problem seems to slowly disappear.currently i got threatened by college that i might <e1>be expelled</e1> for <e2>not participating for nearly a year</e2>, my parents didn't know about this and i wish i <e3>can fix</e3> that so i can <e4>have a chance to enjoy life</e4>. i can't imagine my parent reaction when they know and it makes me contemplating on actually rescheduling it on july.i know this is my fault, everytime i get depressed i pick dumb decision that will f my life... but this one really will destroy it, i have no hope (maybe a little).i'm looking for advice if it won't bother youthankyou"

"i don't know what it the sea air from a few days ago or just a switch going off in my head, but i cleaned up my disaster of a room and decided to ghost some people in my life for good on social media, it's not that they were very toxic, but i think they were just a chapter of my life that i think needed to end.i've awakened with a new sense of clarity, life is slowly returning back to normal. i don't feel as depressed as before.being off from work for half a year, healing from major surgery, during a global pandemic, certainly wasn't on my cards for 2020/21. i haven't enjoyed much of anything in the last 4 years. but that's about to change again soon :)"

"from a pretty long these thoughts have been with me and disturbing me a lot. i dont understand them fully but yea i'm trying. i sit down every night for a few mins and sit stare out my window and wonder whether what i feel is real and not forced by my mind just to keep others happy. like i <e1>force myself to like someone</e1> so <e2>theyre happy</e2> , but i honestly feel empty. no feelings just emptiness. and i usually would <e3>shrug off these thoughts but theyre too burdensome</e3> so i had to sit wnd <e4>think whether any feelings are real</e4>. i honestly <e5>cant love someone romantically or even platonically</e5>, it's <e6>tough when youre empty/feel empty</e6>. the last time i loved someone romantically was a year or two ago and now there's someone but i think im only forcing and putting on an act saying that i feel for them. im probably lying to them about feelings bc i only ""feel$ such feelings when im on a verge of attempting suicide or smth, otherwise i have no feelings. i even probably lied to my friends that i loved them when i feel nothing so they left me cz i cant show feelings well. this must be so confusing for whoever's reading - it is for me too. i dont understand whether i have feelings but i feel guilty that im lying to everyone but also i dont wanna be lonely. this was a stupid rant i needed to get this stuff off my chest"

"hello guys, i am 19 years old and i have been struggling with depression for a few years now. i have a few weeks left of school and then i can study. few days ago i was thrilled, counting down each day until i can finally start living. this school <e1>puts a lot of pressure on me and it makes me unhappy</e1>. that is why i <e2>always sleep after school and barely study</e2>. my grades are still okey. yet i am often unhappy. today is one of these days. i <e3>woke up really late</e3>, because i <e4>went to bed late at night. and i feel like bursting</e4>. as if there is something in me that wants to come out. i want to scream as loud as i can, but i just can't. it <e5>makes me so desperate</e5>. so <e6>fed up</e6>. and on these days i am thinking that nothing will change. i will never pursuit my goals. i have a 1 year break before i study. i wanted to change my life completely. but what if i can't? what if everything stays like this? what if i continue sleeping all day. i want to draw, to go to the gym, to play the piano, etc. but what if after i graduate everything stays like this? what if nothing changes. i can't do this anymore."

"<e1>depression has made me so numb</e1>, ive <e2>lost all sort of regular emotion</e2>, which is bad enough. but now ive lost the connection ive had for others that meant a lot (or barely nothing) to me.i dont dislike them, but i dont like them either. even those that i strongly disliked in the past im completely meh to now. feeling in general is such a chore for me, and <e3>dedicating emotion to multiple people leaves me so drained</e3> that <e4>my brain has just stopped trying</e4>. i feel like a horrible, shltty person, i want to know people again. i want to feel people again. all i see now are just walking pieces of flesh. i dont see people and it scares me. if i do feel anything, i feel fear. i fear that ill lose my family, i fear that ill lose my friends ive known my entire life, and i fear that ill lose my s/o.has anyone else experienced this? am i just mentally broken? is this normal??  im lost, im scared, and im drained. i just dont know what to do."
